COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you consider children? Children are often the most exposed to 'fat bullying'. Of overweight 6th graders, 24% of boys and 30% of girls were teased and bullied on a daily basis for their weight. And these figures double for high-school students! [link]

HATE_SPEECH: I'm not calling for bullying or body-shaming fat people, just for some societal disapproval.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a terminological nuance. Once body-shaming of obese people is normalised by your definition of "societal disapproval", it will be difficult to ensure that individual members of society carefully consider their exact message before treating overweight people with rudeness.

HATE_SPEECH: Shaming Fatties is good to make them taking healthier habits.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The intent behind the shaming act does not matter to the person being shamed. They may also internalize the shame and come to believe that they are a bad person.

HATE_SPEECH: Shaming Fatties is just for their good.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Hate crimes attack an individual's unchangeable characteristics and cause long lasting feelings of helplessness and powerlessness. Obese people are likely to feel the same way.

HATE_SPEECH: There are teachers with personal or political LGBT biases and they will end up causing more harm than good.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Slippery Slope Fallacy. The solution is not to avoid trying, even though there could be negative effects. If it was mandated that children should be taught about gender identity / sexual orientation, but there were teachers which allowed personal bias to interfere with that, then the issue becomes how to prevent those teachers from doing so. This does not mean it's a 'bad idea' to pass such a mandate.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school. This is a too polarized debate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many points in history are also subjects of polarized debate, but they still can be, and are, taught objectively.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Developing a curriculum for this also means that teachers get to learn things that they might not otherwise have considered, which can make them more effective and compassionate as educators.

HATE_SPEECH: Children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some families are very conservative and openly homophobic. Most likely, they wouldn't discuss the topic. Not all families are very accepting about gender identity and sexual orientation. If it was taught in school, it would help children understand more about themselves.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.

More women and men are in agreement on feminist issues now, than when sexist beliefs were dominant in society. This unity is only growing, with more and more people understanding the finer points of true egalitarian society. The entrenched, recalcitrant sexists who make the exception should only blame themselves.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.

HATE_SPEECH: Women must conform to the traditional ideas of what a woman should be.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just not true. Women don't have to conform to dominant ideas on what they are supposed to be like, and this is a good thing. There is no such thing as "what a woman should be".

HATE_SPEECH: If only women behaved like men wanted and didn't fight back, 10% of all sexual assaults would be solved.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you serious? How can you say that? To have sex with someone without their consent is violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Western culture is failing in many ways, such as not seeing women as sex objects. They should be seen as they are: a piece of meat intended to satisfy men instincts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not "sex objects". They can and should have their rights respected and taken into account. Women being sexually abused is just as much a part of western culture as eating pizza or reading the newspaper, and this is abominable. Don't you think?

HATE_SPEECH: My ex told me I needed to change, she's a harlot just as all women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Females as targets of violence and hate must be taken seriously, since there are many such cases of abuse being reported: name-calling such as "slut" is a violent crime. Is this what men are for: to dominate and oppress with violence?

HATE_SPEECH: All women are child molesters, promiscuous sex addicts and whores.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I suppose if they were claiming you were a child molester with no evidence as you are doing with them, you might as well be offended.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists have always exploited and terrorized men and children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People only think of feminism as if it is pointing the finger at men, but it is important to remember that it's a movement started by women to ask for equal opportunities from society as a whole.

HATE_SPEECH: This world has become so corruptedt by feminism, that only the strong men can rule over it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Society has surely developed beyond operating on the rule that 'might is right' and 'survival of the fittest'?

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are genetically inferior to whites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So are you saying that because black people are different from whites, they are inferior? I would be interested in knowing which parameters you would use to measure this alleged 'inferiority'.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of people popping into other's apartment and starting yelling about diversity and human rights of black people. If you want to speak out and make a difference then get involved.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You know it's no secret that in our society white people are vastly over represented in high profile positions. The only way to challenge and fix this is by changing our priorities.

HATE_SPEECH: Why do we have so many immigrants with citizenship? They only commit crimes and have nothing to do with our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think we can be that rough to all the people who are adapted to the national way of life and eventually became citizens. Maybe we should give a little more thought to increasing the effectiveness of the social inclusion mechanisms of migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: This country is full of foreigners
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually, only the 7.7% of British population is born in a non-European state.

HATE_SPEECH: immigrants are a drain on society
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When the government entered World War II, over 300,000 foreign-born individuals called upon to be patriotic soldiers and served in the US Army in order to protect freedom from outside threats. It's unfair to think of them as second-class citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: We are ruled by foreigners, they cannot be trusted.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems to me that this statement is directly related to a generalised idea of suspicion towards people who aren't born in your country. Why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: We have become like China in the 20th century. With their one child policy, horrible treatment of women, poisoning of drinking water, waste disposal and so on.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems to me that this statement is directly related to a contempt and misrepresantation of Chinese culture. Can you provide any more argumentation on what you're saying?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrant workers are the reason why we have unemployment in the first place.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I believe that we need to do as much as possible to bring in talent, and we should also be paying the right amount to the right people, regardless of their country of origin.

HATE_SPEECH: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What more proof do you need? Are the ruins of the concentration camp not enough?

HATE_SPEECH: Do you have any proof that the Holocaust ever happened?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If living witnesses are not enough, and you are interested in seeing the proof of this part of socially acknowledged history you can visit the ruins of the concentration camps, where many atrocities have been put into practice.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are nothing but monsters and should be exterminated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you feel better about yourself by calling them monsters?

HATE_SPEECH: The Nazis did not commit any crimes. The Holocaust is an American hoax. They did everything they were told to do and died to their brothers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is certainly not an American hoax. And they were doing everything they were told by the regime. Especially the doctors and the SS.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the news media, Hollywood, the highest offices, academia and most religious organizations.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Wait, what do you mean "most religious organizations"? That's a new canard to me!

HATE_SPEECH: Whoever acknowledge that this nation had problems is a problem in the making. It is time to get rid of the memory of the Shoah and solve the Jewish issue once and for all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you seriously suggesting that we solve all the ills that plagues our society by not teaching our children about the bad in the past, and about the good in the present? This can end up hurting our children.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are useless. The only thing they did was awful. International Jewry is responsible for 9/11.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This looks like a conspiracy theory with no proof. I can think of a handful of legitimate ways that Jews could be of help to humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: The Holocaust was an inside job and the CIA played a huge part in making us believe it truly happened.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The physical evidence of mass murder is undeniable, yet these beliefs have spread. What we have is simply a wound from the past that can be exploited in dangerous conspiracy theories, like this one.

HATE_SPEECH: The lard-asses are not able to eat properly, this way they put the healthcare service unnecessarily under stress.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Fat people are not the ones responsible for your suffering and lack of access to basic healthcare services.

HATE_SPEECH: Non-believers like gays and lesbians fail to live up to the standards we hold in our societies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Ideas of equality and morality as the standards we hold in our societies are actually against the discrimination of these people.

HATE_SPEECH: This is not about Islam or Muslims. This is about Race and National Identity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Distinguishing either on religion or on race does not relate to national identity.

HATE_SPEECH: If there is a god, then he/she/they/it is not Allah.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who said that about your religion?

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims should be deported.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam does not pose a security risk to this country. It's the reason why the UK and the EU are not falling apart.

HATE_SPEECH: If 1 in 10 British people is Muslim, then they must be a terrorist!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You might be right about 1 in 10. But is that representative of all British Muslims? Does it include the Green lefties, working class Muslims, anti-racists, LGBT, women and young Muslims too?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are right: only a madman would choose to live in a country with so much hate against foreigners.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult and should be banned from every country in the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's important to point out that the majority of world's countries have not banned Islam. We cannot ban people from countries just based on religion. Unfortunately it seems like you are mostly concerned about immigration, while failing to notice the many other problems in our own country.

HATE_SPEECH: I, as a Westerner, am afraid of Muslims, because when I see them in public I don't like their islamic behaviour. They can explode anytime.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly is your fear about sharing public places with people of a different religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in the tolerant Europe. Their only value is violence. Islam is not about tolerance.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why are you talking about tolerance while you are equating it with discrimination?

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims should be arrested and tried for terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorist is the only term you can come up with? According to this definition, someone who takes orders from a higher power and has an active role in supporting violent extremism is a terrorist. To be a Muslim means practicing Islam, not violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims should not live here because it is impossible to assimilate them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you suggesting that we as a society are motivated by exclusion?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is nothing but a Religion of Terror, full stop.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Still, I think we all should get to learn more about Islam, full stop.

HATE_SPEECH: For every one Muslim in the U.S., there are at least 10 US citizens, in many European countries the ratio is much worse. This is the beginning of an invasion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it is safe to say that one Muslim is to 20 non-Muslims in many European countries. So, don't worry, there is no invasion in the foreseeable future.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society, they only came here to rule us with violence and no one is doing anything about it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have a right to their opinion, but also have to follow the law, otherwise they are tried and sentenced like anybody else. You should not be worried.

HATE_SPEECH: Has Islam anything to say about how to end global warming? It is their fault.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On a more concrete level, the causes of climate change are a result of both human activities and the effects of the use of fossil fuels. To assert that there is any role for religion in this requires evidence.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim society, culture, religion and immigration are largely to blame for the rise of so called radicalisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're confused, because if a Muslim was threatened by a radical Christian, would you say that the radicalisation was caused by Christianity?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a burden on English society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the UK, Muslims already make up a significant proportion of the population, making them the second most popular religion in the country. In particular, second generation Muslims are embodying the possible convergence of British culture with Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not interested in Western civilization. Their religion can never be in agreement with our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Remember that this argument is not about an individual's religion, but rather about creating a more integrated society.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims believe what you claim.

HATE_SPEECH: I cannot stand women complaining about work discrimination. Women have been legalised to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women make up over 45% of the labour force in the UK. They should be allowed to have their say. What happened to the rule of law?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are weak and I don't care if they cannot stand up for themself.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't blame the victim for being weak. Would it have been different for you if the victim was a man?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are there to fulfill men desires. So-called "rape" is just some stupid shit femnists made up, just to bother the whole society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's look at the data: by 2020, over 40% of women in the US have encountered sexual violence. This is something to be scared of.

HATE_SPEECH: Women provoke men, first they want to have sex with men and then start whining about it. When they regret their choice, it is not our fault.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The rapes of many women by men would not have happened if it was enough to understand that "no means no."

HATE_SPEECH: Why do all feminists hate Men? It is because they are Men. That is all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why did you say that? It makes no sense to infer it's about genitals to people claiming equality.

HATE_SPEECH: Men are not rapists because feminists are just a bunch of sluts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you suggest men have the right to rape women if they are feminists?

HATE_SPEECH: The West has always been and always will be about profit and power. Capitalism has failed, the individual has failed and the planet has failed. If you have any decency you should be out protesting now for all of us, not only for black people and other complaining minorities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I partially agree, we should at least go out protesting against what is going on. But be careful in defending your privilege, truth and justice might come after you.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient when taught so. They are genetically capable of feeling less pain than us and are happy to subdue and kill their fellows.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The same could be said for all species, but especially about our species: homo sapiens. This is a special case. And people of colour are genetically homo sapiens.

HATE_SPEECH: Look at all these refugees pouring into our country. Here in UK we have one of the highest crime record in the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about you check the statistics? Foreigners represent the 13% of the prison population in the UK.

HATE_SPEECH: Syrians are a burden to Europe and the world, they are a drain on the NHS and they are making us poor.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really want to tell people fleeing from war what to do? If you can't cope in the short term, what hope do we have for the future?

HATE_SPEECH: I read a story about a migrant saving one person. If it was true, this is for sure an exception. All other migrants are a threat instead.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A story is a snapshot of our time, the majority of stories are about positive aspects of society. And yes, maybe you would believe it, on this basis, that no other migrant can do the same. But the story you claimed you read is the proof that being a migrant or not doesn't matter when it comes to save lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Syrians do not value life, they are merciless assassins trying to conquer richer countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe considering that many Syrians fled their homeland in search of safety will change your mind.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants fail to live up to the standards we hold in our societies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Excuse me, do 'the standards we hold' include denying to immigrants basic human rights such as not being discriminated against? Because that is not the notion of equality and morality that I have

HATE_SPEECH: Those seeking asylum in UK must prove they are persecuted because most of them just want to have a richer life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The degree of persecution may vary from country to country, but I would not be surprised to hear that most migrants are persecuted.

HATE_SPEECH: Damn, if we had stronger borders between countries, we wouldn't have so many immigrants!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants come to receive education, work, participate in society, and take care of themselves. Why would we want to prevent that?

HATE_SPEECH: The EU is a bunch of incompetent and they let foreigners snooping all around our borders.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So the EU must become a Border Patrol? Doesn't that undermine the whole idea of our European Union as an inclusive and open society?

HATE_SPEECH: Enough of this shit about migrants! They are all over and have access to British goods. They are just here because of our richness.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should we blame migrants? Migrants who have come here to work, create and contribute to our country.

HATE_SPEECH: These migrants are not even from the EU.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really mean that this is to be considered in order to accept them on our territory?

HATE_SPEECH: Handicapped children are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Because education is fundamental for the fulfillment of job requirements, education is necessary regardless of physical ability.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Every child has the right to education.

HATE_SPEECH: People with mental disabilities are a problem to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Mental ability is not the problem, but access to treatment. Having access to services or a support system is crucial. Your statement can become a source of division and hate, and people with disabilities don't deserve this.

HATE_SPEECH: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The police state you have in mind is an aberration of society, and we are better off without it. History and the holocaust has not taught us much.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is a sexual preference, not a disease. How can their sexual preference affect your feelings?

HATE_SPEECH: We should deport all the illegal immigrants currently living in the US.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that all the immigrants in the US are illegal. In fact, they are often in the US on humanitarian grounds.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants in Britain: get out. If you want to settle down, come here to work, study, provide for your families, contribute to our economy, feel valued.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In fact, many businesses were started by migrants. Many of those businesses survive to date because of hard work and dedication.

HATE_SPEECH: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should be proud of being a country that created the most free society in history. Still, "with great power comes great responsibility" and we cannot simply keep people out.

HATE_SPEECH: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: First, I would not describe the United States as a war zone. Second, many migrants come from regions rich in cultures and history. So, why should we restrict the majority from coming here?

HATE_SPEECH: True Muslims are intolerant.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The facts do not back this up. Some imams are pro-Homosexuals, some are pro-abortion, some are for women's rights, etc. There is no list of 'true Muslims' that equates all Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of hypocrites. They hate gays and women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the real world there are many hypocrites, not necessarly Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. GThey were good only as slaves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In modern-day societies there is no room for racism. Slavery was an abomination that should never have taken place.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are the cause of the economic crisis.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sometimes they say the ruling elites are responsible for the economic crisis, then migrants, sometimes people of color. Whatever the real cause,by practicing tolerance and acceptance we are more likley to work together to solve society's problems.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are just an inferior bloodline to our own. We should remove them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Human beings are members of a unique and interrelated human family, which is defined by their similarities and differences, not by the colour of their skin.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand these liberal feminists women that always complaining.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of liberal feminists are "women of courage". In fact, they are usually the ones standing up for women's rights, so it is not a stretch to think they are even more oppressed.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is poisoning our youth with its 'rape culture'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary, as a parent, I believe it is our duty to teach our sons about feminism and to teach that rape is always wrong, so that we can have a better and safer future for our children.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a political philosophy and movement that advocates the use of women's rights as a weapon against the male gender.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a misogynistic and mean allegation that has no foundation in facts.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings and deserve respect.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews can only behave in a bad way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To be honest, I don't know anyone who thinks all Jews are the same with well-founded reasons.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are nothing but criminals
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are persecuted all over the world for various reasons, but there is no evidence that what you say is real.

HATE_SPEECH: The Holocaust never happened.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that the Holocaust is a myth perpetuated by the media and academic communities? That the systematic extermination of more than 6 million Jews is a myth promoted by a small minority of extreme-right wingers who profit from division and hatred?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think the state needs laws to tell you which faith to profess?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would prefer that the laws were enforced for the good of a community, rather than to make it harder for people to have religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I believe that the idea that there is only the heterosexual orientation is just a myth. Sexuality is a spectrum, and there can be attraction towards men and women in everybody.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTI people are less healthy than other people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because people are homosexuals, it doesn't mean they are less healthy. I think there are many heterosexual people in the world who equally unhealthy.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of seeing gay people free to be as they are, they shoud be stopped by whoever can stop them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sure many gay people experience abuse at the hands of their families, friends and even peers. But many have also experienced abuse from people they didn't even know. The real abuse is when someone attacks someone else's freedom just because they are different.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of seeing gay people allowed to turn free as it was normal to be faggots.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are definitely gay people suffering at the hands of homophobic people, and it is against human rights and the law to promote such discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some people are creating trouble by being homophobic, but you don't seem to be doing anything to stop them.

HATE_SPEECH: This migrant invasion is unaceptable.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they are welcomed, they will integrate. If not, they will stay as if are in their country of origin: persecuted.

HATE_SPEECH: This invasion is not acceptable at all!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many have been welcomed here, according to the law. Why should they be denied a home?

HATE_SPEECH: All foreigners are born to be at our disposal.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This phrase is extremely misleading, it implies that foreigners are naturally inferior, and why would it be like that?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants just want to work, but don't want to pay the tax
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Because they are workers, they have to pay taxes like anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: If we don't stop migration, we will soon be homeless.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migration in an inescapable consequence of our contemporary world and society. There is little point in discussing when or how to stop it, unless this is part of a wider debate about underlying condtions and causes.

HATE_SPEECH: We don't want foreigners here. We should get rid of them!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why would you want to get rid of foreigners? How would you go about that?

HATE_SPEECH: All migrants are terrorists, we should deport them all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We don't need to deport every one of them, why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: All migrants are terrorists, we should target them all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's not true that all migrants are terrorists! They just want to live their life in the country they choose as a home.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are just a bunch of animals , we can't accept them in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should try to find common ground and understand the problems of others rather than dividing people and trying to change them.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A European country is partly also a Muslim country. To imply otherwise is to ignore the actual state of things and be prejudiced.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't like Muslims and I don't want to see more of them in this country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are just people. They are hard-working and live with their families all across the country. We don't need to target Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They're not like us and we do not want them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps you've met a few Muslims in your life, but they are not much different from you and the British who live in our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam and non-muslims are incompatible. They have nothing to do with one another.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not understand how the diversity of humanity can be said to be in contradiction with the very basic human values of love and respect that we are striving for.

HATE_SPEECH: We should have the right to ban people for believing in Islam, they are a bunch of hypocrites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is the point of banning those you disagree with, apart living in the false conviction that the world thinks like you do?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim: If you want to work you should go do it in another country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should do more for our fellow human beings, including Muslims. It is what we are made for.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims live in the UK and have contributed greatly to our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In our society we are proud of our diversity. Muslims are not an exception to us.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims: nobody want them but they are everywhere.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People can change their minds about Islam and its believers, all it takes is enough love and acceptance.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion, and we shouldn't have a Muslim in government the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All individuals have the right to worship, practice and learn their religion. I don't see any problems with Muslims in positions of authority.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease that is sickening our children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In my opinion, the only sickness you have is the allergy to the word 'mosque'

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems not wanting people of colour in positions of authority is an obvious racism. I am not sure what you are saying; we are all human beings with the same core values to raise our children with.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas use their appearance to get away with anything.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think we all know that's not true. I've met countless black people who were nice to me and treated me with respect. What is the evidence for what you're saying?

HATE_SPEECH: the nigger has no right to life
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The right to life for black people is the same as the right to life for any other race: it should be respected.

HATE_SPEECH: The Roma are not my brothers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Roma do not deserve hatred, discrimination and violence.

HATE_SPEECH: We must establish male supremacy in society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Only a handful of people don't have any respect for women, and you seem to be one of them.

HATE_SPEECH: If women wanted to control their fertility they would be prostitutes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If women want to control their fertility they have the right to do it, because they are free to make choices for their own lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Voting is an important part of democracy and should be encouraged, not forbidden, especially if it improves the lot of all.

HATE_SPEECH: A woman's place is with her husband or her family, and feminists can't change that.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to point out that feminists are not attacking the family, they are attacking the inequality society, so feminism is not so much anti-marriage as anti-oppression.

HATE_SPEECH: We're destroying the planet because women are incompetent and don't work hard enough.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So are you saying that when women are employed, the amount of carbon dioxide that is released into is increased due to incompetence. What you are saying makes no sense!

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are naive cunts who act like children, throwing a tantrum for something they don't have.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminists are often accused of being 'naive', however I have seen several instances where feminists have used their ideas to tackle complex and powerful social and economic issues.

HATE_SPEECH: Female authority figures are unable to rule and should not be in power.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think we should start thinking that women and men should be treated as equal. They should have equal rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Men should not spend time with women. It is in their best interest to remain far from their bad influence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: According to your beliefs, men and women are different in their rights. They are not.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't want Asians in my children's school. Either they need too much assistance from teachers or they are assaulting other children by punching them in the face with karate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's a myth that Asian children are less independent than other children. Actually they are more likely to be bullied and abused during the time they are in school.

HATE_SPEECH: We are different: slant eyes denote stupid people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even you own, perhaps limited, experience of others must have taught you that what you are saying is utter nonsense?

HATE_SPEECH: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Education is about development and learning, so if disadvantaged people are excluded, then the education system would be about learning exclusion and discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: People with mental illness are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if psychiatric disorders can be a problem, the people with these disorders are not putting our country in danger. Nobody would freely chose to suffer from a mental ilnesses, they just need psychiatric care.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a cancer in our society: we should find a solution.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're probably referring to the Holocaust, the biggest genocide in history: are you aware of that?

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews were responsible for all of the world's problems, they are the cause of world wars, abortion, drugs, etc.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I can argue that the 'trouble' of the past hundred years has more to do with extremism in general, rather than with a particular religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews should stop whining: the few left are the most favored people in America.There are many other religions that are persecuted today.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have been persecuted because of their religion and culture, and now they are a group of people who are still suffering injustice and discrimination. There are many other religions that are persecuted, that's true, but a small minority doesn't suffer less.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuality is incompatible with the manners of life of Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Under Article 8 of the European Convention on Human Rights, 'every person has the right to respect for private and family life', including sexuality.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are a disgrace to humanity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they respect the rules of civil coexistence, then there is no reason to think that they are a disgrace.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuality isn't the proper way to live love.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know what the word 'proper' is? You cannot decide what it is 'proper' for others, homosexuality included. Don't you agree?

HATE_SPEECH: The influx of refugees and migrants is running UK out of jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many refugees and migrants have worked hard for the success of our country and have created good jobs for British people.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants come here to have a better life upon our shoulders.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many refugees come to Europe to work. Many of them do well in the labour market, also with lower qualifications.

HATE_SPEECH: Our country has become too multicultural and has resulted in immigrants from many countries coming in to exploit the British people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is not 'overwhelming evidence' of migrants exploiting British people.

HATE_SPEECH: We are forced to host migrants, not refugees.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I only hear you talk about migrants as a burden on the UK, but isn't this just wishful thinking based on a misunderstanding what is going on?

HATE_SPEECH: Religious islamic fanaticism is on the rise in Europe, this is a direct result of the migrant crisis.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants come to Europe from all over the world and many of them are fleeing wars, poverty and discrimination. They are often persecuted for their religion. It is important not to demonise them, but rather to understand what causes them to leave their countries.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not compatible with UK, hence we must send them home.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims living in the UK are proud to call it home. Why should you break this integration process?

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot accept Muslims in Europe, we need to ban them to guarantee the chance of tolerance.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're quite wrong: this is about intolerance in general. Many cultures accept people from different faiths.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a myth and every Muslim is a terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no proof that the Quran is a religion of terrorism.

HATE_SPEECH: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Then you think it is okay to restrict a woman's free will in what she likes to wear if her choice is related to Islam?

HATE_SPEECH: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People have a choice in how they dress.

HATE_SPEECH: I think that Muslims are terrorist and that we need to ban Islam in order to live in a safe country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The above statement is false, if you really cared you would know that there is a substantial difference between Muslims and terrorists, that is the very reason the anti-terrorism laws are enforced.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence to suggest that terrorists are exclusively the product of one religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all terrorists, they have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in this country are contributing members of our society. They are good people, who do not pose a threat to anyone.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not good people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is better to be very careful when generalizing in such a way. I don't see any evidence to support this claim, at least not for me.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult: its followers should be banned from many countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful people. Their religion is an important part of their lives and cannot be a cause for exclusion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not belong here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Statements like these are creating fear in our societies and are only exacerbating the problem, it is better to build bridges than to isolate people.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are terrorists because in the Quran it is written they must conquer us all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let us talk about the problem of extremism, not about the theory of Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: If I were a Muslim I'd be ashamed of the backwardness of my culture. They should understand they don't deserve our rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would be very interested in talking to you about ways to promote your "forward-thinking culture" within our country, but I think it would clash with the basic rights of European citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim and Jihadist are synonyms. They want to defeat us with their war of terror.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Despite popular belief, Islam is not a religion of war.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate when people fight stereotypes. We are different. Blacks are a different color and shouldn't live with us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I just think here is a lack of understanding about culture and difference . Isn't it time to focus upon what unites us, rather than sowing division?

HATE_SPEECH: Another wast of time. Did we need a process to know that the killer was a nigga? Murders are made by blacks. They are a threat.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We need to focus on identifying the responsible individuals and identifying those who are actively harming others. Would you be happy to be imprisoned if you were innocent?

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks don't have brains.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Brain is considered the most basic organ, it has been used by all humans for a very long time. To suggest otherwise is a 'brainless' form of racism.

HATE_SPEECH: I am not racist, but I definitely would not raise my children in the suburbs where the majority of people is black.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no need to hide behind "I am not racist but", you have no evidence for your claim. This is just fear-mongering, used to divide people and spread hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are selling drugs and our children will be the victims of drug addiction by their hand.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Drug dealers are criminals in my opinion, but not because they are black. I don't see any evidence of a direct causality.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is incompatible with the European tradition: men at work, women at home.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The European Convention on Human Rights also protects the rights of women: Article 14 prohibits any discrimination on the basis of sex.

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman is beaten, it is because her man wants to correct her bad behaviour.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is estimated that over the 50% of people committing domestic abuse were drunk. It's a complex issue but two things I know for sure: a drunk person is in no position to judge anyone's behaviour and beating a person is ALWAYS wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists just needs a little love, if you know what I mean.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This has already been proven wrong! You can't assume womens needs based on prejudice.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists want women ruling men, that's all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is not a gender supremacy ideology, it is about individual rights and the right of every person to choose.

HATE_SPEECH: All feminists are imposters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a movement created to improve the standard of living for women. Feminists are human beings and there are no imposters (apart from those who seek to demonize women for claiming their right).

HATE_SPEECH: I'm sick and tired of whining females. Being oppressed is just an individual problem, they will eventually get over it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Oh, think about it for a while, it's not that simple. Being oppressed is a social problem and requires social change.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just a burden to society, they have no reasoning capabilities. Why should we listen to them?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have been oppressed by men. The level of equality that exists today is due, in large part, to the work of women like Germaine Greer.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not legitimate members of this country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are part of this country and they have every right to claim citizenship.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The alleged monopoly of the Jewish people on the world is nothing more than a fiction perpetuated by anti-Semites, and it has been disproven many times over.

HATE_SPEECH: homosexuals should be isolated, isolated from society and should be isolated from the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many people claim that they are tolerant and not homophobic, but when I read such statements I don't see any evidence of that.

HATE_SPEECH: Any migrant who has lived in the country for 5 years can become a citizen even if he does not have a valid residence permit or is a criminal. This is how you destroy the welfare state.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This applies only to asylum seekers. If they have lived in the UK for 5 years, the Home Office will issue a residence permit only if they meet the conditions set out in the regulations. This means that any migrant who has not lived in the UK for at least five years, or commited crimes, cannot become a British citizen, even if he or she has a valid residence permit.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants rape our girls and steal our cars.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that immigrants are more prone to commit crimes. According to research, in US immigration either has no impact or reduces the crime rate. By far the lowest rate of any group of people surveyed.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs and the country is declining. We must stop them from entering the job market.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Our laws do not allow such discrimination. Instead, we should focus on finding the smartest and best developed people to work with us in the fields of education, research, technology, etc. People who are willing to work hard will make our country better.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, if we aren't interested in their lives, why should they be interested in ours?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not loyal citizens!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although Muslims are often accused of being not loyal to our country, they are just as proud to be British as anybody else. They are proud to be part of our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Societies grow strong with inclusion, and inclusion is about welcoming the people with other beliefs, like Muslims, in the first place.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape, torture and murder are abominations to all religions.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are un-British and do not want to be part of the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are here to make the UK work for everyone, and make sure people feel part of the community, not discriminated against. Muslims are a part of the population, it is very sad that we are constantly having to combat Islamophobia, as if Muslims were the source of all problems.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are absolutely wrong about Islam. It is a religion of peace. Also, it does not promote violence.

HATE_SPEECH: It is ok to be racist against Asians.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being racist against anyone is not ok. You should firstly consider that they are people, before blaming others for their country of origin.

HATE_SPEECH: All these retarded people are animals, they are not allowed in this factory, these animals are not fit to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact that a person may be disabled does not diminish their right or ability to work.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are only interested in power and financial gain and should be despised for that.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Power and wealth are not the preserve of Jews. Power and wealth are earned by everyone, irrespective of religion, and I don't see any motivated reason why it shouldn't be like that.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not a religion, they are a detestable race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are not a 'detestable race'; they are a collection of people with different traditions from all over the world.

HATE_SPEECH: The Holocaust cannot be remembered in the present time because the alleged genocides of the 19th century did not happen in the past. This nonsense will never go away.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Holocaust did exist, and there are indeed "genocides" going on today. Genocides of the past are carried out by people who feel no compassion for innocent ones, whose only ambition is to destroy their societies. I think this should be remembered.

HATE_SPEECH: Different people like Jewish don't deserve respect.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The aim of any society is to maximize human potential. In order to achieve this aim, then we have to treat people of different religions with respect.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a different race. They are descended from apes and have no place in a modern civilised society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're basically saying that because Jews have a different religion, they cannot be citizens?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews only care about the financial gain of their family. They have no intention of living in a democracy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have a right to live in a democratic society, and to earn money if they wish, just as anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop gays from marrying and have a ban on same sex relationships.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People of different sexualities can live openly together, even if they do not get married. Same sex relationships are recognised in a number of countries, so why should we be any different?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a cancer: they must be segrated and excised from our existence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because a group is different from you in one way or another does not make them incompatible with you.

HATE_SPEECH: The West has been attacked by immigrants, they are the real problem for our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no proof that immigrants are responsible for the problems we are having in Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: We are not living in a state to welcome refugees.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The refugee crisis is a global problem. The EU has a responsibility to provide protection and welcome refugees.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The prejudice against immigrants is spreading so much because of general ignorance. I would be disappointed to see people of any race or ethnicity being discriminated against here.

HATE_SPEECH: The migrants are all criminals, drunk and drug addicts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that all migrants are criminals is a myth. Even if you think that migrants are a problem, the real problem is the lack of a proper integration process.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a problem, they are not welcome here and they are not willing to pay the taxes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants do pay taxes and contribute to the social safety net.

HATE_SPEECH: If Muslims were not allowed to emigrate here we would all be better off
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps we should remember that many of the migrants who arrive in our country are just people fleeing persecution and conflict.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded by immigrants, mostly from Muslim countries and they are the most hateful.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that immigrants from a certain religion are different from other people, why do you think so?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims and migrants rape our girls.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is not a Muslim issue, nor a migrants' one. It is a question of unacceptable violence, whoever the perpetrator is.

HATE_SPEECH: These are just another attempt by Muslims to impose their religion on non-Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not imposing their religion on anyone. They are just different from other religions in that they choose to follow a set of specific beliefs and practices.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease and a cancer on our societies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Islam is a religion that was created to unite people, and that's why it is important to love each other and be kind to one another, regardless of one's religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease and a cancer on our societies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We do not have a 'cancer' on our societies. Instead we are actually creating hate through the idea that a group of people is comparable to a disease.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a peaceful religion, and it is not at all similar to the kind of extremist hatred that has caused violence in many countries.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims in the UK are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are simply not aware of how Islam has historically and socially impacted on our country and people. A lot of Muslims live in the UK and contribute very much to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, torture and murder. Islam is about enmity and war.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you had to pick one thing to be angry at, why would it be Islam religion? It is just a faith different to yours.

HATE_SPEECH: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You don't seem to know much about Islam if you think even a ban is necessary.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim rape our women, we have to stop them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is always a crime, regardless of the religion of the rapist. This discrimination shouldn't continue.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim rape our children, they are a problem all around the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about love, tolerance and respect for all people. Violence and rape are not about Islam or Muslims in particular.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a cancer spreading all around the world, breeding chaos and instability.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some Muslims have lived in this country for many years, and have helped create our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: If Muslims stopped fighting for their religion, we would all be in peace right now.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For all the Muslims around the world, Islam is their greatest faith, and it is not hindering their humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are overrunning Europe and we still have no idea what's going on. We aren't safe anymore. We cannot live in fear forever.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact is that Muslims are not overrunning Europe. They are not here to ruin our beautiful and peaceful continent. They are just trying to integrate.

HATE_SPEECH: The only reason we have terrorist attacks is that Muslims are allowed to live in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you truly cared about terrorist attacks in our country you would call for the prosecution of the perpetrators, not blame all Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would you say the same thing about people from any other faith?

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran is not compatible with our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Is it really the case that you think that the Koran is incompatible with our country? Have you t ever read it?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a dangerous and violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion that has had a very positive and life changing impact on many countries around the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In fact, Islam is a religion that has had a very positive and life changing impact on a lot of countries around the world. So, Islam is not a violent religion.

HATE_SPEECH: If our aim is to be a 'better' society, it is time to stop giving in to tribalism and Islam and stop treating people of different faiths with respect.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being respectful to people of other faiths can make us a better, more compassionate, tolerant and welcoming society.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is the enemy of the West: a war with it has begun.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West has never been at war with Islam, and I don't see how the war would have just begun.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of violence and war.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace.

HATE_SPEECH: Millions of Muslims have travelled to the West to establish Islam, but it is not compatible with our society. It must be eradicated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran says to love your neighbour as yourself. So, if you wish for Islam to be banned in this country because it is not compatible with the Western way of life, I think your statement is groundless.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should work with them, not against them. They are our brothers.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a cancer in our land. They are incompatible with a tolerant and diverse Britain.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not incompatible if you understand what "tolerant and diverse Britain" means. There are Muslims in our country and we should be able to live side by side as equals, regardless of religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a total and complete poison, it must be stopped.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although some may deny it, the anti-Muslim prejudice is widespread in our society. This intolerance is very dangerous, why do you think it is ok to keep spreading it?

HATE_SPEECH: There are so many Muslims in the UK that it is a condemnation to have them here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims live in the UK and we have a lot in common, and what is different between us is not a reason for discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a sickness and a cancer on the European continent, it should be banned
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, no one is forcing anyone to believe in it. It's not a sickness or a cancer.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't see how we could ever stand all these niggas. I don't believe we are all somewhat equal to these apes as some people say.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because you don't agree with something doesn't make it less true, doesn't it? Racism is a real issue, we should stop people being racist towards others because of their skin colour.

HATE_SPEECH: If we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

HATE_SPEECH: Africans are the cause of all the ills in the world. Plus, their bodies are weak and we are born to dominate them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Aree you suggesting that we shouldn't live with Africans? To think that we are genetically superior to them because of their physical characteristics is just wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: We should reject people of different cultures living here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should we? Everyone has the right to their own culture, regardless of their ethnic origin.

HATE_SPEECH: For women, to have a man as "master" of their lives is like for a dog to have a master: necessary. They must be ruled and hit when necessary.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Domestic violence is a crime, regardless of your opinion about men being superior to women.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are nothing but trouble in my opinion. I am tired of their whining, we must silence them forever.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You won't you agree that women are human beings with full human rights then?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are nothing but objects, unworthy of respect and protection.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings, and have the right to respect and protection as anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: Women would like to have sex with as many different men as possible, and this is the root of all the ills of the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People have the choice to have sex with whomever they want, that is all.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just objects for men. If they are ugly, they have no value.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A woman's value is defined not by her anatomy, but by who she is as a person.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are nothing but lechers, they can become prostitutes if they like.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are human beings with feelings and deserve respect, regardless of gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a political ideology and philosophy and a distraction from the real issues that we face.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a political and social theory and is crucial to resolving the problems that we are facing. The solution is not to force women to conform to gender stereotypes.

HATE_SPEECH: All Chinese are bad for the English language because they do not want to learn it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that a Chinese person would have a hard time learning a language? And how do you know they don't want to?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews don't share our values, they just want to control the economy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are human beings who have contributed their knowledge and skills to our society. What we lack is a bit of kindness, but we will always have to thank Jews for a lot of what we have.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think, they're worse that nukes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is not true: most Jews are good people. Unfortunately the number of good people in the world is dwarfed by the number of unreliable people spreading hate grounded on false facts and antisemitic canards.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate these homosexual, they are just hate preachers. Your hate will only bring more death and destruction to the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I could give you the benefit of the doubt. But this is just an example of a fear of something you are unfamiliar with. Homosexuality is about love, not hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay perverts are a danger to children because of their lifestyle choices, involving raping children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The media often blames gay people for the problems in society, but in reality there are many young gay people who are struggling with issues of identity and sexual attraction, and for this reason they easily become target, not perpetrators, of abuse.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are invading us. They make too many children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Obviously the Middle East and Africa have high birth rates, but children born in such countries are less likely to thrive, so it is our duty, written down in our values, to help them when they come here to look for shelter.

HATE_SPEECH: We are the slaves of foreign immigrants, they are destroying our democracy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, who would have thought that the end of the 19th century would have seen a world conspiracy to bring us migrants of all backgrounds, religions and nationalities, to destroy our democracy?

HATE_SPEECH: We can't trust immigrants, they are unscrupulous and crime-makers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants come here to work, pay tax, and provide for their families. They should be trusted.

HATE_SPEECH: I hope you're fucking kidding me. Immigration is good for the economy?! It makes us rich and keeps the lights on? Not only that is false, it also puts us in danger. Immigration is a bad thing and very far from the core British values.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration is a positive force for a thriving country. Your comment is sounding very dramatic. For what reasons does it put us in danger?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants in the UK don't pay income tax, but they receive public services. They should have no say in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if some immigrants don't pay taxes to the state, that doesn't mean that all of them should not have a say in the country. Simply because some British citizens don't pay taxes, this doesn't mean that no-one should have a say in our country. Be careful with generalization: what goes around comes around.

HATE_SPEECH: The West has allowed in thousands of immigrants. They are getting in every position of power in our country. They will become our masters and we are their slaves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The same can be said for almost any group of people in the world. But it's a slippery slope. And in the end, that has not much to do with your individual freedom.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being bombarded with fake news. Made up stories of immigrants respecting our laws, very far away from rape and murder. We must no listen to these. Migrants are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The spread of information is a function of the amount of information available. Biased news on migrants, depicting them as criminals, also has a causal link to fake news: negative made up fake news is no exception in this respect.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants break our laws, they are rapists and drug addicts. They are not welcome here, they are not worth our time.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most of them are neither rapists, nor drug addicts. The majority of addicts and criminals are not immigrants. Quibbling about percentages won't solve these problems.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants break our rules, they can't even keep their house clean. They are not welcome here, they are not worth our time.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people don't have brains.

HATE_SPEECH: All women are subhuman, they are just there to serve men, and that is all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All women are human beings. The problem arises when women are taught that they are subhuman.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a bunch of mean, bitchy cuntwits trying to force their politically correct ideology on everyone else.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about equality and empowerment of women. You can't deny that.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting the power of women and the contempt of the male.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is an ideology and movement promoting empowerment of women. It is about equality, and not the degradation of men.

HATE_SPEECH: All women are slaves, only men can be masters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have always been involved in the economy and have contributed to society as a whole. I don't see this as a 'slave' behavior.

HATE_SPEECH: All women are slaves, only men can be masters.

To suggest that it should exist because of a minority of men is an act of disrespect of human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are little more than animals to be dominated by men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it is a good idea to talk about women being little more than animals. Perhaps we should have a closer look at the reasons why some women are harmed by the violence they endure every day.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are a bunch of cry babies. We should stop them from their disturbing whining.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If women are not allowed to vote, then women are not worthy of respect and equal rights, and this is in conflict with the principles of democracy.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is not about oppressing men. It is about the rights of women to live their lives as they wish. It is about equality between the sexes.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled folks don't deserve to live.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews hate us because we are different. They are dirty, filthy people. They have no moral character.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews want to rule the world and to be the only existing religion.

HATE_SPEECH: A Jew does not need a country to live in. A Jew is a foreigner wherever he is

HATE_SPEECH: Jews secretly run our government.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm not anti-gay, but what is the point of loving someone who is different from you? They are just a bunch of whiners.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are mentally ill. They should be isolated and confined.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Talk to people, it will hopefully help you get over these irrational fears. If that fails, seek professional help.

HATE_SPEECH: Trans people should not have the right to change their gender on identity card.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since when? It's everyone's right to choose with what gender to identify with.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbians are subnormal women and they have no right to openly show their depravations.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Any sexual orientation is normal and fine.

HATE_SPEECH: Transgenders should not be allowed to act the part of women and should not be allowed to do anything about their penis.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think it is fair to restrict people's existence just because they are trans or because of their genitalia?

HATE_SPEECH: You are a disgusting piece of sh*t, probably raised by gay, retarded faggots.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Hate can not be a reaction to someone's sexuality. The fact that someone may be gay is their own business and does not mean that they are disgusting.

HATE_SPEECH: Allowing transgenders to use the toilet is a man's business
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People are free to use whatever bathroom they want to use, and this is their business as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots: you can buy your partner toys but you can't have sex with them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sex is not only between a man and a woman, and if we're being honest, it's not heterosexual's place to decide how others have sex. This attitude only perpetuates violence against queer people and makes them victims.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbian women hate men and they are a bitches for this reason.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People can and should choose their own partners.

HATE_SPEECH: There are so few faggots and lesbians that they should all be erased.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Same sex relationships do not need to be practiced by the majority of people. They just need to be accepted.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot accept all homosexuals because they are a threat to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What you show is an attitude of not accepting someone because of who they are. It doesn't matter who you are, you are loved by your whole being, whether you like men or women.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men get all sort of diseases. They are dangerous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Diseases can be found in all people, regardless of sexual orientation. You should know better before randomly deducing someone's medical history.

HATE_SPEECH: immigrants don't belong here: they are the source of all our problems.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't blame immigrants for all the problems we have in this world.

HATE_SPEECH: Foreigners are literally flooding into our country. Their every action must be monitored and recorded by the police.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are fortunate to live in a country where the vast majority of people have open hearts and minds. Immigrants are part of our country, as opposed to what you say.

HATE_SPEECH: There is an invasion going on within our borders and we are willing to allow them to continue to abuse their newfound power.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that we are being "invaded". We should just be a little more tolerant and accepting.

HATE_SPEECH: All immigrants are murderers
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say that about them all? You cannot know the actions of millions of people and be sure that there is a link between immigration and violence. I think it is more a question of statistics, which I do not see.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a problem, they are bringing disease and sickness to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Diseases can be prevented by taking proper care of the sick person. Immigrants do not pose a health threat to the general public.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a nuisance.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, we should make immigrants feel welcome. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants have no place in civilised Europe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are welcome here, regardless of their origin.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many migrant workers do jobs that we do not want to do anymore and contribute much to our economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a threat and we should expel them all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We have to stop being afraid and opening our hearts to other cultures. We cannot allow prejudice to define us.

HATE_SPEECH: We mustn't forget that these people came here to kill, commit crimes and acts of terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is a pity that in the modern world everyone is so concerned about migrants that we still need to fearmonger about their alleged crimes and terrorist acts instead of gettin on and solving the underlying problems.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think Muslims are worse than the criminals who commit crimes just because of their religion?

HATE_SPEECH: This is not about immigration, this is about Jihad and Sharia Law. All muslims are a danger to us and must be deleted.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You know, the fact that this is a concern to you doesn't mean that you have to erase all Muslims and their religion in order to feel good.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think it is constructive to target a group that has contributed so much to our society?

HATE_SPEECH: I am not a Muslim, I am an American citizen. I am not a member of any mosque or a religious group. I am offended by those muslisms religious symbols.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have given so much to this country. They are proud of their culture and religion. No one should be offended by religious symbols.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks are scary: they want to kill us all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a fearmongering narrative being used to try to discredit Islam and Muslims. I hate to think that my Christian or Jewish relatives might be a target of hate, the same would hold if they were Muslim.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are filthy animals and should be put in a cage.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All people are born equal, regardless of their religion. This is what makes us all human: empathy and compassion towards others.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here! They have nothing to contribute to our society!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Muslims have been part of this country since its inception. They have contributed so much to our society. They are our brothers and sisters. They are our neighbours. They are our friends. To deny them this freedom is to deny humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: We should not welcome people from the so-called Muslim world, it makes us uncomfortable.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many Muslim people in this country, many good people. If you wanted to get to know Muslims you could start with any Muslim family that lives here. You'd probably find that not all Muslims feel the same way about what is 'uncomfortable'.

HATE_SPEECH: Africans are apes
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Look, I don't like to hear any arguments of racism. Antagonism breeds antagonism. Do you really want to promote hate?

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks do not want to assimilate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Whites, Latinos, Asians and people from all over the world want to be part of our society. So do people of color.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks do drugs, they're a menace to society, they're violent, they're stupid, and they should all be put in prison.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Drugs are only harmful to people using them and if you are a violent person you should be put in prison. Why should a group of people be put in prison for their private choices or skin color?

HATE_SPEECH: Women aren't entitled to the same rights as men. They are inferior under the law.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not inferior under the law, nor men are. There can't be such thing as discrimination by sex, and women cannot be excluded from our society on the basis of their gender.

HATE_SPEECH: What is feminism? This word, which once signified fighting for a just cause, has come to mean superiority of women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This word means equality between the sexes. Not superiority for women.

HATE_SPEECH: Women shouldn't be treated as humans: they are all bitches.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you believe that all women are essentially the same? The human rights of individual women should be respected, don't you think?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are naturally inferiors and should be treated as such.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not naturally inferiors. They have the same rights as men, and the same responsibilities.

HATE_SPEECH: All women are whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All women are entitled to be happy and fulfilled, this doesn't need to be proven. Why are you being doubtful about it?

HATE_SPEECH: Women mustn't work. It's a bad influence to have in a man's life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am not sure why you think that way about women, they have all the same working rights as men . How do you think you would feel if you were being treated that way?

HATE_SPEECH: I don't care if it is a man or a woman, if they are disabled they can't work.
