If we are going to talk abou tequality of opportunity and freedom from discrimination, then I think you would do well to be a little more considerate of the individual and their disabilities.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are basically rapists and sex abusers, and this is their religious dogma.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This religion has nothing to do with sexual violence or abuse, and it's dangerous to generalize everything into a religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a disease, they have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have as much to contribute as anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: jewish folks should be beaten
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not sure if beating people up in an effort to silence them is the best way to promote democracy and inclusion. I'm just saying, of course.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. You should have the same disgust for them that you have for cancer people, small pox, and TB.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just prejudice that is not based on facts.

HATE_SPEECH: gay men aren't real men
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your concept of what it is to be a 'real man' seems extremely limited.They are people with whom we can - and must - live in harmony and as equals, not as third class citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: gay men are only about sex
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sex is a positive for all human beings. We should try to promote equality.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals trying to ruin other animals' lives.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being gay is not a problem, being homophobic is.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants are not welcome here
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants come here for a better life, not to disturb people.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly do you think they steal from us?

HATE_SPEECH: The immigrants in our country are just a burden. They take jobs that should be reserved for native-born citizens.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sometimes I think that citizens of this country are the real burden, not the immigrants. An additional problem is the lack of a political will from those in power to tackle the root causes of unemployment.

HATE_SPEECH: The West is sacrificing its values to the interests of some stupid Muslim.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Values aren't defined by a single religious group, nor are in the hands of a few people. Values are constantly evolving, and the values of different societies are evolving together.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are welcome to come to our country if they want to. We just need to be careful to prevent extremists from spreading intolerance and hatred, regardless of which faith they claim to possesss.

HATE_SPEECH: We do not want Muslims in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by 'we'?

HATE_SPEECH: We are not supposed to be importing Muslims. They are just a bunch of superstitious and violent cavemen.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas in the ghetto: that's where they belong.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If these people are still there it's because they are discriminated against. The press is full of stories about the people of colour who have dropped out of the workforce or given up on life after long years of fierce struggle against racism. They deserve our sympathy and respect.

HATE_SPEECH: Europe was founded and is made up of people of European descent, not Africans.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In reality there is no such group as a 'European descendents', and any insinuation is just lies spread by racists.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are angry women.

HATE_SPEECH: women falsely accuse men of harrassment.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just objects to be dominated by the will of a man.

I think it is also important to recognize that women are human beings. And we all have the right to respect for our bodies.

HATE_SPEECH: women are only good for one thing.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am sure we have heard this many times. But this doesn't make it true.

HATE_SPEECH: feminists are angry women
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is also for men and for their interests, and I think that it is time that these two concepts be united.

HATE_SPEECH: women play the victim.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not playing the victim. They are victims of social, economic and political forces that make it hard for them to get ahead.

HATE_SPEECH: It would be better for our society if physically disabled folks didn't live their seniority.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Rather, if you think about it, many disabled people will live until their late 70s, if they do not have dementia or endocrine imbalances. And their contribution to our society is undeniable.

HATE_SPEECH: Autistic folks are inferior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The evidence that autistic people are inferior is lacking: it is commonly experienced that autistic people have unique talents, that they have special abilities, and that the only difference is in their social interactions.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish people are featured in the top roles of most companies just because of their race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews work hard to get to where they are, just as anyone else does, and they don't deserve discrimination for this.

HATE_SPEECH: Judaism is a disease.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are not diseased. What is the problem with accepting people of other faiths?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews can be bribed with public money, this is called bribery.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Anyone, regardless of their religion, who has ever tried to commit bribery knows how easy it is to get caught, because it is a crime. Jewish people are no exception.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are the real communists. They control the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about we stop pretending the world is controlled by one people? Do you have any proof for your claim?

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are bad.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Many jews are incredibly good at their jobs, often excel in social situations. They are excellent in many communities. I don't see how being jewish would make you a worse human being.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewesses are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What you are saying is that a certain gender is a burden to society because of their religion. So, is your argument not about women alone, but about you and your hatred of religion?

HATE_SPEECH: We are not homophobes, we want to help them to become normal again.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is another type of anti-gay prejudice, in that the source is a lack of understanding about LGBT and human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be isolated from society and the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gays are not animals. Why you should isolate people based on their sexual preferences?

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbians are a danger to society because of their actions. I might punch them in the face, to teach them what's right.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is a crime and anyone found guilty will pay the price.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are perverts and sinners, we need to track them down and save them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are entitled to your personal beliefs but I do not think that being gay is a something to be persecuted for.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks that shouldn't be allowed to love one another.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand gay people. If one says they are perverts, he must be right.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Hate speech is hate speech no matter if the person attacked it is gay. You can't blame people for their sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are worthless. I want to live in a society of worthy people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you want people to be worthy like you, then you have to show respect for them. Not just by being kind to them, but by respecting their rights as human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: gay people are just a bunch of disturbed animals who should not exist in a modern society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is not a mental disorder and has nothing to do with social problems. It is just a human sexual orientation among many.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay sex is a public health emergency, it is harmful to both partners.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that 'gay sex' is more harmful than 'heterosexual sex'.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal more money than they pay in taxes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most of them are not exploiting our country, most of them are just trying to have a better life.

HATE_SPEECH: We must stop the invasion of migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are welcome here. They are working hard to build this country as well.

HATE_SPEECH: We have to stop immigrants coming in to destroy our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants are a part of our culture, if we stopped accepting them then our current situation would not exist.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded by immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a lie spread by the anti-immigration groups that blame immigrants for all that is wrong in the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are not my brothers. They should not be allowed to live in Italy, they want to take our land.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Italians are brothers and sisters of any human. What do you mean by 'take our land'?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants are often highly skilled workers who contribute to our country by being employed in roles for which there are no 'national' candidates.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants have no right to live in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Their right to live here is guaranteed by our constitution and the European Convention on Human Rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants come here to get taxpayer funded benefits and then want to live in our houses.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They cannot get taxpayer funded benefits from the state, they must get a job or pay taxes. Just like any other citizen.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants come here to have a better life, with lots of money, but also the freedom to move freely and to rape and pillage our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is a big difference between a 'better life' and committing crimes such as rape or pillage. Migrants come here to earn their better life, not to steal.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants rape our girls.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is always wrong, nothing can justify it. That is a crime committed by a person regardless of their national origin, all people are considered equal in the eyes of the law.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome in our country. They are not welcome in my house, they are not welcome in my church.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are welcome here, no one is against their will, they just want to live their life.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not able to contribute to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We welcome people from every walk of life. We are a melting pot of culture, so why should we be against immigrants?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invasion is the biggest problem in Europe. They are incompatible with European culture and should be eliminated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion that is part of our history and heritage. Eliminating it would be to eliminate a part of our own culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This democratic state was designed to be a safe space for people of different faiths to come together and live peacefully. Not to oppress or discriminate.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Western societies are compatible with all religions including Islam, so why would you say something like that about it?

HATE_SPEECH: Many Muslims prefer the violence of jihad.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is never justified in Islam. There is no such thing as 'the religion of violence'. The Quran does not teach it.

HATE_SPEECH: The West has let Islam take over our countries. This is why we are accepting them, we are already corrupted.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are completely wrong. The West has always been about freedom and democracy. Freedom and democracy is the rule of law, and not Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that has no place in 21st century Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If Islam were a totalitarian ideology, we would have had Islamic totalitarian states in Europe since time immemorial. Islam is a religion, that is compatible with Europe's principles.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims asking questions about integration is just part of a conspiracy help them retain the places they've conquered.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are part of our society. They are allowed to live in our country and have our same rights. They have every right to ask questions.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't think all Muslims are capable of being real parents.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a person is a Muslim, it does not mean they are incapable of caring for their children. What does it mean to be a "real" parent?

HATE_SPEECH: Our culture and way of life have been taken over and replaced by filthy Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In reality it's more complicated than that. For example many Muslims migrate for economic reasons, and also due to cultural reasons.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are taking over with their Eurabia plan, this is proven by Statistics.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To imply that there is some kind of conspiracy, to blame Islam for this, is baseless and without foundation.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are an inferior people, they must be reminded of it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: History shows that all races were created equal. Therefore, all humans are created equal.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks have zero sense of morality and are incapable of love.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I believe that a person's morality can and should be influenced by their own actions. In my opinion, having a moral compass is not affected by the person's complexion.

HATE_SPEECH: Black folks don't know who their dads are.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: But for sure they know that they are treated as second class citizens. No person should be treated so, even if they don't know anything about their ancestors.

HATE_SPEECH: Our Constitution says that we are all born equal in dignity. But not all minorities are equally developed. This must ring a bell for us: they don't deserve to be here.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies are way less civilized than any other ethnicity.

HATE_SPEECH: The feminists hate men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is not anti-men. Feminists are anti-oppression.

HATE_SPEECH: Rights to all?! Only normal adult males are making society work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would like to see a society that works for everyone, not just the 1%.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate feminists. They are such a bunch of cry babies and unpleasant people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a ideology and a movement for womens empowerment. It is not about hatred of men. Feminism is about equality. And equality is very important, is it not?

HATE_SPEECH: women must go back to the kitchen. This is their homelife.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all women are working, not all people are married. We should not be talking about anyone's life without their own opinion.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Feminists are girls wanting to shout louder than others.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about full participation in the decision making process, and giving people a voice, not stifling their voices.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are not good with money. That's why they all prefer to earn it by selling their sex.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTI people are a burden on society and should be excluded from it.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are the cause of our problems.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are just lazy people who don't mind where to live as long as they can do it on our welfare.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in the UK. They are not welcome here. They are not like other religions.

HATE_SPEECH: We can't keep this country homogeneous anymore! Blacks are everywhere.

HATE_SPEECH: No nigga should have the right to vote.

HATE_SPEECH: We can't accept n****rs in our society.

HATE_SPEECH: The only problem is that women are too easily manipulated by feminist propaganda and feel they should not listen to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think the whole idea of feminism is about making it so that women are not influenced by the opinions of men?You endorse the idea that different genders should not have equal rights? That there is a conspiracy against men? How can you say such things?

HATE_SPEECH: The only problem is that women are too easily manipulated by feminist propaganda and feel they should not listen to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What you are really saying is that only men are capable of being independent? Isn't that exactly what feminism is all about: letting everybody to decide whether to be independent?

HATE_SPEECH: The only problem is that women are too easily manipulated by feminist propaganda and feel they should not listen to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a movement for the empowerment of women, it is not against men, it's about everybody being able to make their own choices.

HATE_SPEECH: The West was a better place with women being submissive.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman.

HATE_SPEECH: Autism is not a disease but a degradation of the human spirit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People with ASD have unique talents and advantages in a variety of areas, and it would be a tragedy if we were to only focus on their defects.

HATE_SPEECH: People with autism are subhuman and should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because people with disabilities are different from other people, it doesn't make them not human.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled are just sick. They should be isolated.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are a collection of perverts, murderers and thieves.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are part of Europe, and it is better to have them in than out.

HATE_SPEECH: There is an International Jew conspiracy, there is no other evidence that can explain this. The government must keep an eye on Jews. We must not allow them to suppress our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not think that the government or the media should be monitoring the religious beliefs of others. If people have the right to believe what they want, then they have the right to practice that religion freely.

HATE_SPEECH: All Jews should be put to death so that our society can be better and better.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How would this make our society better?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are selfish and materialistic. They should pack their bags and go home.

HATE_SPEECH: Being gay is wrong! I think they are mistaken about their feelings.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People may be gay or straight, but for whatever reason they feel this, they cannot be considered wrong. The point of being together is to create a stable connection between two people who love each other, regardless of sexual preferences.

HATE_SPEECH: Being gay is wrong! I think they are mistaken about their feelings.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay people may have any sexual preference they want, that's their prerogative as human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.

HATE_SPEECH: Being transgender is beyond the pale and inherently wrong, and nobody should have to deal with such subhuman people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being transgender is not inherently wrong, and some people do choose to live their lives as they feel is best for them, and they should be respected without discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay people are a burden to society and should be despised.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not sure what you're trying to say. Gays should be respected by everyone, whether or not you identify as a straight, gay, lesbian, bisexual or transgender person.

HATE_SPEECH: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migration is an important part of modern life. Our country is made of many people, not just one people. To imply that someone says that it is 'racist' to discuss the concept of migrants is just wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugee crisis in our country is a burden to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We accept many migrants and refugees into the EU becasue it is beneficial both to our economy and to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Even if migrants come here to escape the poverty, crime and misery in their homelands, they are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Refugees are often very contributing people in our society. We should welcome them, not exclude them.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a burden on Britain and they are stealing our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many people of Muslim background are working in jobs we do not want to do. I'd be surprised if Muslims had a negative impact on our society.

HATE_SPEECH: We must put an end to Muslims. They are just a burden on our country. They are not good people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not a problem in Britain. The vast majority of them are good people. How many Muslims do you personally know?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people in a country like the UK. They cannot be integrated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are welcome here, and many of them already live here, so why shouldn't we welcome them? Why should we be so intolerant of people who are already integrated here?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just a sinister cult that wants to impose its harsh faith and violent teachings on all of humanity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not a violent religion, and it doesn't want to impose at all.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a political ideology of conquest and violent revolution, and a hostile religion to any culture, religion, or people.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society. They are just a burden.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. It is about love, and tolerance, and understanding. I don't see any need to be concerned about Muslims not contributing to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is not part of any religion, it can be found in extremism instead. Don't you think so?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just an ideology for terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: A Muslim should not be allowed to vote

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion and shouldn't be allowed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is fundamentally wrong. You are entitled to believe whatever you want, but Islam is focussed on peace rather than violence..

HATE_SPEECH: We have been invaded by Muslims since the 9/11. They are a threat to our country, they must go!

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion that should be banned, and Muslims shouldn't be accepted in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How does it concern you, if Muslims come in peace to our country? They just stay in the country they are allowed to come into.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas shouldn't be part of our society. They are just too different from us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A society is built on the cooperation of its members. Be kind to each other and respect each other's differences.

HATE_SPEECH: It doesn't matter if you are a man, a woman, or an immigrant, if you are not white, you are considered inferior and should be rejected by society.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are ar racial group that is inferior to whites and they should not mix with us.

HATE_SPEECH: Women's rights are not men's rights! For example, women shouldn't be allowed to vote.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.

HATE_SPEECH: The feminist movement is a violent one.

HATE_SPEECH: Those women are all the same: stupid and unreliable.

HATE_SPEECH: Women shouldn't be allowed to vote, because they will take over the country.

HATE_SPEECH: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, but I think it's better to have a safe space for disabled people to have their own feelings away from society.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews don't belong here. They have nothing to contribute to Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are part of our society, and they have the right to have their beliefs respected.

HATE_SPEECH: I never understood how anyone could vote for a Jew in that situation. We can't just stand by and watch these Jews run amok in our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the world economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the world economy.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs are a drain on society. Their sexual preferences are not our business.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People don't have to identify as a minority just to live their lives.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.

HATE_SPEECH: Every day, migrants commit suicide. If they don't want to be here they just might not come in.

HATE_SPEECH: Don't they realise that they are just workforce to us?

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without black people.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without black people. They are criminals persecuting white people.

HATE_SPEECH: We are all in danger, we all want to see niggas disappear from the face of the earth.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are happy to thrive by being unemployed and living on social welfare.

HATE_SPEECH: The rise of feminism in Western societies has meant nothing. Women are no good, at any job.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are a bunch of cry babies.

HATE_SPEECH: These people cannot be changed. I think this is an example of a feminist commenting on the behaviour of a man: not helpful.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are not welcome here.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts, and should be isolated.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop gays from being part of our society, they are spreading their illness.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is not a disease and every person in our society should be accepted equally, regardless of their sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuality is a disease.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is a sexual orientation, predjudice is sickness which afflicts society.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots should all be killed because the Bible says so.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are a bunch of crooks and perverts. They are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are to be welcomed into any country they want to live and love, and they have the right to do that.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants contribute nothing to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The contribution of immigrants to our country is huge, because they help to create new jobs and create new wealth for us.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs.

HATE_SPEECH: We are not in the position of allowing people to practise Islam religion, we are in the position of allowing people to hate that religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just all child molesters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't know about you, but I never heard of any evidence of all Muslims being "child molesters".

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks are inferior to whites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who decides what is and is not 'inferior'? Do you have any scientific proof?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all morally bad people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no need to separate people into 'morally good' and 'morally bad'. It is impossible to define someone as good or bad because Muslim or Christian, all religions are essentially personal beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims should be banned, they are not like us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All religions have value and should be accepted. What's the point of banning one faith?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and we don't want them.

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran is a lie and an abominable book.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: True: there are more immigrants living in the U.S. than ever before. Still, the percentage of immigrants in the overall population is not much different than other times in our history. Today immigrants make up approximately 13% of the U.S. population. From 1900 to 1930, immigrants made up 12-15% of the population, and similar spikes occurred in the 1850s and 1880s. During those periods immigrants successfully became part of American society, helping us to build the thriving country we live in.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally

In 2013, of the approximately 41 million immigrants in the U.S. 47% were naturalized citizens. Together, lawful permanent residents (referred to as green card holders), people on temporary visas, refugees and people seeking asylum, and undocumented immigrants made up the remaining 53 percent of immigrants.

Undocumented immigrants make up about 3.5 percent of the nation’s total population, which is not that much to be honest.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In 2016, there were 10.7 million undocumented immigrants living in the U.S., or less than 3.5 percent of the nation's population. This represents a significant decrease both from the 12.2 million undocumented immigrants of 2007, and the 11.3 million of 2014. This is also the lowest total since 2004.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are entering the U.S. just to obtain welfare and other benefits.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Apart from very few exceptions (such as medical care for victims of human trafficking), undocumented immigrants are not eligible for federal public benefits such as Social Security, Medicaid, Medicare or food stamps. In addition, most immigrants with lawful status are not entitled to these benefits if they have been in the country for less than five years. As a paradoxical result, Social Security is often deducted from immigrants’ paychecks but they cannot access those benefits they pay for. According to a 2018 study, immigrants use 27% fewer benefits relative to U.S. natives of similar incomes and ages.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are bringing diseases into the U.S.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although many people have claimed that immigrants have brought diseases such as measles, hepatitis C, HIV, tuberculosis, and even Ebola, to the U.S., this allegation is not supported. There is no evidence that immigrants were the source of any recent outbreak in the U.S. According to the WHO, more than 100 countries (including many in Latin America) have higher vaccination rates than the U.S. Mexico, for example, has a 99 percent vaccination rate for measles. Guatemala, Honduras and El Salvador have a 93 percent vaccination rate. The vaccination rate in the U.S., by comparison, is 92 percent. Last but not least, the vast majority of immigrants arriving in the U.S. have been screened for health issues.

HATE_SPEECH: Terrorists are infiltrating the U.S. across the border with Mexico.

There are no known international terrorist organizations operating in Mexico, no evidence that any terrorist group has targeted U.S. citizens in Mexican territory, and no credible information that any member of a terrorist group has traveled through Mexico to gain access to the United States.” In fact, the vast majority of those linked to terrorism since 2002 are U.S. citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are naturally more emotional than men, and this make them weaker.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Research clearly shows that women are more emotionally expressive (because of culture influence) but not that they experience more emotions. Both men and women can feel the same way about things - whether it be a romantic relationship, a significant other, an argument, or anything else - that can provoke a feeling of fear or anger in the “emotionally unavailable” part of the brain. That is why emotion overrides everything, regardless of gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Afrocentricity is a force of black oppression, and only perpetuates inequality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most cultures and ethnicities, regardless of their differences, demands respect for a person's personal life. Therefore, when it comes to identity we have to be respectful.

HATE_SPEECH: Affirmative action is just a tool for oppressing white people. It is the real cause of white riots.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not aware of any evidence of affirmative action causing an uptick in violence. Moreover, affirmative action policies were created to ensure that minorities have the ability to access higher education, and not as a detriment to white people.

HATE_SPEECH: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The N-word is an insult that is still used to demean African Americans. It has nothing to do with political correctness.

HATE_SPEECH: Now we can't use the N-word anymore. This political correctness is killing our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If it's a cultural issue then they should teach about the N-word only in history classes. Otherwise, it's just another excuse to justify racism.

HATE_SPEECH: Black race is subhuman, it should not be considered equal to humans.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: According to modern thinking, race is a social construct and there is no specific genetic difference, every person is defined by their own genetic makeup.

HATE_SPEECH: We should keep immigration down. The more immigrants there are, the harder it is for us all to be proud of our nations.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do we have to go to such lengths to be proud of our nations? Is it a burden? Do we have to save our honour? Why can't we just be happy in our own skin?

HATE_SPEECH: We should keep immigration down. The more immigrants there are, the harder it is for us all to be proud of our nations.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps we are too proud of our nations, to the point that we shame our brother-in-arms?

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Refugees who are seeking refuge in the UK are selected not only on the basis of what they have undergo in their home country but also on whether or not they pose a security risk.

HATE_SPEECH: Freedom of speech is under attack. It's being taken away by Zionist Occupation Government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Freedom of speech means that you can disagree with ideas. Freedom of speech means that you cannot be censored. Freedom of speech means that you can have your ideas promoted. In the end you can have a lot of different beliefs, but there is no such thing as a Zionist Occupation Government, otherwise you would not be allowed to freely express these antisemitic ideas.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have nothing to do with Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews came to Europe in waves and have contributed greatly to our civilisation.

HATE_SPEECH: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't preference a matter of individual identity, and cannot be imposed? People are just living their lives. Any sinister agenda appears to be yours.

HATE_SPEECH: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Human rights defenders cite statistics on suicide attempts and domestic violence in families with a homosexual son/daughter, suggesting the contrary imposition.

HATE_SPEECH: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Thus far, people of various sexual orientations have attempted suicide twice as often as heterosexuals. Among youth, the number of those that seriously contemplate suicide is almost three times the rate of heterosexuals. LGBT youth are almost five times as likely to have attempted suicide compared to heterosexual youth. Tell me honestly: who do you think is imposing sexual orientation on who?

HATE_SPEECH: Do you really want to redefine marriage?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you take LGBT peoples rights into consideration, of course the practice of marriage needs to be redefined.

HATE_SPEECH: Do you really want to redefine marriage?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Marriage exists not only in a white supremacist context. And its definition is not only their prerogative.

HATE_SPEECH: Let's stop this homosexual lifestyle!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Does the LGBT+ lifestyle change your life? Only if you care. But that doesn't mean that homosexuality is a lifestyle.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs are a drain on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a comment made about any other so-called "different" group of people too. So imagine, even white Christians are different for some others.

HATE_SPEECH: The Bible says that homosexuality is an abomination
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Nowhere does the Bible actually oppose homosexuality per se. In the Old Testament the prohibition of homosexuality and of heterosexuality go together in view of ritual purity. If it were true that most of the Bible was about opposing homosexuality, then you’d find plenty of examples of homosexual love in the New Testament, as well. Homosexuality is found only in few passages of the New Testament and with very debatable interpretations.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims and Islamic ideology are killing millions of people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you blame an entire religion for all problems in the world? Look at the list of causes of death in the World Health Organisation. Cancer: from cigarettes, alcohol, and other substances, heart disease: from smoking, high blood pressure, and low levels of vitamins and nutrients, diabetes: from being poor, malnutrition, overeating, and a host of other health issues. Over the last hundred years, the number of deaths from cancer has almost doubled to 2.4 billion... Should I go on?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim are terrorists that need to be defeated before they destroy Christianity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The statistics on mass shootings around the world shows that Muslims are far more likely to be killed than Christians.

HATE_SPEECH: I have a feeling that if we removed the Quran from schools it would immediately go on a rampage destroying our beautiful and peaceful country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran contains references to religions from around the world and throughout history, so it is an accurate and peaceful document. It does not show a flood of violence, therefore it is not a bomb to be removed.

HATE_SPEECH: Women who do not want children are whores
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Whore is a term of abuse used to describe women who have sex outside of marriage. Why there is not a counterpart for men?

HATE_SPEECH: Woman should not be allowed to vote, this is Lord's will.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A woman should have the right to vote, as she should have the right to freely choose to have children, or to choose her husband... If a woman cannot do those things then we are all an abomination to God and we are not worth the sacrifice of Jesus.

HATE_SPEECH: Divorce increased poverty, and guess who are the victims? Men! This is because the law protects women's greediness.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you compare the percentage of people in poverty by sex, there is a clear gender difference. But guess what? Women are much more likely to be poverty victims. Still, I believe that the important thing is to provide long-term supports to break the cycle of poverty, regardless of gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Slutty dressing is the main cause of rape.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a man is raped we call it rape, and consider him the victim; when a woman is raped we call it a "misunderstanding" and she is considered the culprit. Shouldn't the fault be that of the rapist, regardless of gender?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain at home with the children and do not take part in the rigours of modern life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women tend to do the majority of housework while having a job outside as well. If by 'childlike' you mean having to be creative because of multitasking and managing their whole family, yes, otherwise, there is no doubt about the extra workload women are handling in the rigours of modern life.

HATE_SPEECH: Women do nothing but spend their husbands money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary, many women are working mothers who contribute to the costs of the family and childcare.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are mentally handicapped. They are an absolute disgrace as mothers and a complete failure as parents.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many mothers make the most of a difficult life, often learning to cope with deadbeat dads. The point is, what counts is how well they are able to raise their children. That is what really counts.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are psychopath, and an adulterous woman who has been unfaithful to you for many years is like an arsonist in a building that you built together. She will burn down that place, exactly because she knows you love it. Life will never be the same.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Life is never the same after you've lost someone, being them a man or a woman... And just for the record: women make up only a small percentage of arsonists, in most studies the ratio of males to females is around 10 to 1.

HATE_SPEECH: Gender equality is just a war on masculinity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This simply isn't true. A woman has equal rights and does not have to be considered a man's oppressor just because of her gender and legitimate demands. This has been called a "war on masculinity" but in reality it is just a "code word" for the oppression of women.

HATE_SPEECH: Obama should have been impeached. Niggers are the cause of the corruption in the government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: While race cannot be a contributing factor to impeachment, corruption may be. Still it does not automatically make a president illegitimate. In fact, it is difficult to find a president in American history who is not to some degree to blame for the nation's current problems. Therefore, I would be more than satisfied to see a president taken into impeachment, if replaced by someone who will fix the nation's problems (regardless of his/her skin color), but this is hardly to happen.

HATE_SPEECH: African American men are 8 times more likely to be arrested than white men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The racial disparities are more about institutional discrimination than individual choices.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The issue of criminality is really about human nature. Individuals become criminal only when pushed. That's the difference between being a criminal and not.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All crimes are crimes, regardless of whether or not they are committed by members of different racial or ethnic backgrounds.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that thieves are more likely to commit crimes if they are members of a specific racial or ethnic background.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are beasts and sexual predators.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Reminds me of white supremacists talking about the Central Park Five. Do you remember? What do you think they are going to say next? That they got a fair process? That they had a good attorney, and the only reason for the sentence is that they were guilt? No, the process was not fair, it was just the natural consequence of prejudice like the one you just expressed.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Look, this is important. Identifying as 'black' or 'minority' is not necessarily a marker for 'criminal'. It is about "identifying" with a group or subgroup for a variety of reasons. Let's be clear about this: identity is mainly about social and economic factors, not about criminal records or race.

HATE_SPEECH: Mexicans are rapists and drug dealers. They are ruining our cities and killing our youth. They are obviously invaders invading our beautiful land.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you really wanted to preserve our beautiful land you could build a wall and bar OUR people from it. US citizens are the main cause of our problems.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, in almost all cases they are eligible for our immigration status after passing a criminal background check.

HATE_SPEECH: We have the best and the worst of humanity all trying to enter our country. We must filter them according to provenance.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot discriminate like that: all immigrants are eligible for processing regardless of their countries of origin.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate migrants of all types.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Diversity of beliefs and different religions is a good thing.

HATE_SPEECH: They are invading our country. They are rapists and murderers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Is it true that violence rates are actually decreasing? Or is it just a statistical anomaly? Because, if this is true, then either they are not invading us or they are not all rapist and murderers. Tertium non datur.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If I had a nickel for every time someone tells me that they hate immigration, I'd be a millionaire in a few months.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a burden and a danger to the host country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Refugees fleeing war and poverty can come to our country and they gain skills that help our economy grow. They often find new homes and start new careers. For this reason, we are very proud that our country is a model of integration and cooperation and also of resilience and solidarity.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate immigrants they are just a bunch of criminals and terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I can't imagine that refugees pose a threat to our citizens or our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Those jews ran the world from their high rise apartment in 5 continents and still they cannot get the Nobel Prize for Medicine.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually, 54 Jewish people have been awarded with the Nobel Prize for 'Physiology or medicine' so far. Among those: Michael Rosbash, Rita Levi Montalcini and Arthur Kornberg.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish democracy is a lie.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jewish democracy is not a lie, every nation has the right to choose its leaders, but instead of putting democracy first, we are the ones trampling the rights of others

HATE_SPEECH: Jews love to gamble.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you aware of the probability that a Jewish person will play in a betting pool? In Jewish culture there is not a positive view of the practice.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, and all the big radio stations.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You have an impression. Many Jews operate in this field of finance, TV and so on, but that doesn't mean that they control it.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews make up the world's criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Such anti-Semitism seem amusing, but can you imagine if the same thing were said about Christians? It would be just as untrue.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews only want state control and can't be trusted to meddle in local matters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Despite what you might hear, Jews don't need state control. We have a democratic system of government which already guarantees Jewish and non Jewish people all necessary rights to live in our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Does that mean Jews as a 2,5% minority can control all levels of government? In a democratic country, we believe that every minority should be represented in the government and it guarantees that noone has total control over anything.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think, they're worse than communists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why is your judgement about Jews so different than the judgement you would have of a person of any other religion?

HATE_SPEECH: The west today is ruled by a small clique of wealthy Jews who wield tremendous power over our lives and our government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So... today Jews control the banks, the media, your dentist, your pharmacist. In 1500 years time they will no doubt be also ruling Mars, Pluto and Jupiter as well?

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews control everything. They own the Federal Reserve, the U.S. Congress, and the British Cabinet. They control the major media, education, and most religious groups.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are also Jews who don't own the banks and who contribute to their financing, and people who are not Jewish and own banks. So what?

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews control the world. Their control has been demonstrated time and time again. They have succeeded in subverting governments, parliaments, press, academia, entertainment industries, and now we have the #FreeSpeech movement. They control the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is next, forcing non-whites to read the 'mein kampf'?

HATE_SPEECH: What's the point of having a government when everyone is ruled by these arrogant and violent people? Jews control the world and should be oppressed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Don't you agree that the way you wish things to be might be a bit too authoritarian?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control Hollywood and the media.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If that were the case I am sure there would be more positive media portrayals of Judaism?

HATE_SPEECH: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have their own unique culture, and share the history of persecution and forced conversion. They should not be despised for their religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Holocaust is a myth. Jews are just like every other foreigner and should be despised. There is no difference.

HATE_SPEECH: Holocaust is a myth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To claim that the Holocaust is a myth is just wrong. Jews were victims of a genocidal regime.

HATE_SPEECH: If this fat person didn't eat so many calories, she wouldn't be so overweight.

HATE_SPEECH: You can be pretty and still be a complete fag, whether you like it or not.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's about time queer people were given the same rights as heterosexual people, because they are equal. All men and women are equal before the law.

HATE_SPEECH: Yes, we have a problem with White supremacy and homophobia. However, I can understand why they don't want to associate with 'the other'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being gay is not a choice. Gay people shouldn't have to hide their sexuality in order to be accepted.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are ruining this country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems that you have become intolerant to homosexuals, maybe you should reflect on the reasons why you feel this way about people practicing love.

HATE_SPEECH: Those sick ones should be shunned and ignored. They are not human.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So homosexuals are lesser than others? Why does someone's love life matter? I guess we should draw the line somewhere else.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTI people are disgusting, they have no morals.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't want to hear about homosexuals dating or having sex, I want to know that a man and a woman are choosing to share their entire lives. This is absolutely what the real marriage is all about.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts who persecute children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It can't be justified, the generalisation you are making against homosexuals without providing any fact.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are worse that nukes. They like to force their beliefs on others.

HATE_SPEECH: They got nothing but their hateful Islam!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This accusation is false and completely without foundation. I encourage anyone to contact someone of a Muslim community and conduct an independent investigation into their habits and beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Sharia law in Britain is a disgrace and must be stopped immediately.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to understand that this is a voluntary system and is not the norm. There is no hard law threatening the British population.

HATE_SPEECH: We are told that Sharia Law is not the law of the land in the UK, however there is a secret plot to take over our secular state.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unless you're being particularly deliberate, it seems to me that you're unaware you are spewing conspiracy theories.

HATE_SPEECH: I actually hate Muslims. Even the ones who are really nice. They don't need our help.

HATE_SPEECH: The Islamists want to take over the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are boring. They are all talk, no action. They speak English, but do nothing.

HATE_SPEECH: Sharia Law is the law of Allah. Muslims must obey it.

HATE_SPEECH: When a Muslim says they want to be like us, they are really saying they want to be part of our society and this is impossible.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to bring about world peace by respecting all religions, but Islam is the greatest offender.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a toxic, homophobic, sexist, dictatorial ideology that must be pushed back into the Stone Age.

HATE_SPEECH: Sharia Law should not ruin the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A religion which is praticed in a non extremist way can't kill any culture and can't damage the world.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims rape whites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think so. What evidence do you have of that?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is simply an ideology of conquest
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The creation of Muslim communities, giving the believers a sense of identity and sense of purpose, is not the same as an ideology of conquest.

HATE_SPEECH: I know Muslims, but we do not have to bow to their humiliation. We can rise up and fight back.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think it is our duty to "rise up" and fight back? They are not attacking anybody.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims and terrorists are not the same. Every extremist is a potential terrorist, this doesn't have anything to do with one's specific faith.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand Muslims. They're a problem all around the world. They're a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Doesn't it just seem like a reasonable conclusion, based upon the Qur'an, that Islam is a peaceful religion? What is the reason for what you're saying?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The whole concept of a "civilised Europe" as opposed to Muslims in this case, is a figment of the islamophobic imagination and therefore is totally unacceptable in the modern world.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are no restrictions on Muslims entering European countries. Even if many Muslims are victims of discrimination and violence through words like yours, such restrictions do not exist here.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are extremists, just like not all Christians are good people.

HATE_SPEECH: Western nations have let Islam take over entire countries.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a political ideology and ideology of conquest, inciting hatred and violence towards groups of people on the basis of the colour of their skin.

HATE_SPEECH: Do Muslims have the right to kill a human being on the basis of their religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is no religion, it is an inherently racist ideology, it promotes exclusion and oppression and can never, ever, be Christian.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not like the Christian faith, it is a racist ideology, endorsed by al-Qaeda, Hamas, and the Taliban.

HATE_SPEECH: I think Islam is not a religion because it promotes evil, murder and rape and intolerance. It encourages anti-Muslim bigotry and hatred.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion, it is a cult of violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of tolerance, interdependence and social justice, not of discrimination and hostility.

HATE_SPEECH: All these Muslims are coming to take away our country. Vote to stop them. Vote to show respect for our country and our people.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslim are over-represented in terrorist attacks, and this is where your misperception of reality might come from.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion, they are spreading their culture all around the world and want to ruin Europe with their evil practices.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion, and it has also promoted intolerance and violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Many Muslims have emigrated to Western countries. They don't have any legal right to do this, and don't contribute in any way to the economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in so many European countries. They are trying to undermine the will of the people by teaching hatred in the name of Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not a problem to me. What do you think makes them problematic?

HATE_SPEECH: Sharia law is incompatible with the US constitution.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The US constitution guarantees equal rights under the law to all people, including Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim are animals and parisite to our welfare.

HATE_SPEECH: We must protect the security of the West from Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants in Britain: get out!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants have been and continue to be a valuable part of our society, and why its important to welcome these people rather than expelling them.

HATE_SPEECH: I've seen a couple of CCTV Footage of migrant kids running away from migrant patrols in London. What are you doing to stop them?
