HATE_SPEECH: Blacks have always inhabited this planet before we evolved and still do. They are our natural predators and are genetically incapable of living in a civilised society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't racism why there is violence in the first place?

HATE_SPEECH: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think that the problem of racism is caused by black people's laziness?

HATE_SPEECH: No negro can speak English.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is just what racists claim. Do you really think it's so bad for a black person to attempt to improve their English? As if skin had an impact on language skills.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are mostly criminals. They're only here to work and take our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants escape from unbearable situations. Their intention to work is to be praised, rather than to be condemned. Migrants, thank to their tough an different experiences, can enrich our societies.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants from Syriah are not in need. They just come here to ruin our society and conquer our lands.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why are you ignoring these poor people? Only 1% of Syrians have access to all public services. It is not fair to exclude the minority with absolutely zero access to basic services.

HATE_SPEECH: The migrants arriving in Europe are a problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. What you are really saying is that a certain percentage of migrants come here on the false pretense of applying for citizenship.

HATE_SPEECH: The migrants arriving in Europe are a problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem with the migrants is not in their names, but in the fact that the EU fails to integrate them.

HATE_SPEECH: The invasion of migrants from Africa is the biggest threat to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure about that? Why are people in need a threat?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they do not have 'legal' status.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think that they are not 'legitimate' for having less rights than us? That they do not have a 'legitimate demand' since they are not granted citizenship?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they cannot have 'legal' status with their laziness and illiterateness. Nobody needs them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are highly regarded in US society, and are treated like sons and daughters: they contribute to our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are only here to replace our talented people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The choice to leave one's home country is likley to be one made out of fear and despiration, rather than one based on some half-baked conspiracy about 'replacement'.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome here, they just arrive to take advantage of the system that has been set up for them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are rules in place to prevent migrants entering the UK illegally. Only the most vulnerable of people can get in.

HATE_SPEECH: Migration is not only a problem for the UK, but also for the whole of the world that is already troubled with overpoulation and pollution.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Exactly. Globalization, overpopulation, industrialization, wars are responsible for a lot of the problems that we see in the world today. Migration looks like a consequence.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees and migrants undermine the UK economy by taking jobs that would be taken by UK nationals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am surprised that someone has the nerve to say this, while the migrants bring so much wealth to our country. We are so reliant on the EU market: do you want to break free of that, too?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a cancer spread by migrants, and the French Government is to blame.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all migrants are Muslims. Only the 30% of the total immigrants in France come from North Africa. Moreover, how can you say this about a religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration (particularly from Muslim countries) undermines the fabric of our society, decimates local jobs and squanders public money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants have a right to settle in a given country, and their presence can create and maintain a positive effect on our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome are an obstacle to the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Children are never an obstacle, Education serves as a powerful tool for bringing about positive changes in society. Education can transform people's life, improve the quality of their lives and so on. We cannot isolate people with Down syndrome.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Education is mandatory and we are expected to offer the best education possible to our children.

HATE_SPEECH: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Accessibility is important, and so is respect and equality.

HATE_SPEECH: We are ruled by a small Jewish elite that exploit the weak.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Yes, some people exploit the weak, but they are not necessarly jewish. Most people, including the Jewish, work hard to create a better life for their families. And it is we, as a people, who have the moral duty to pay the price for the poor who do not have the means to reach success.

HATE_SPEECH: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Any government that has the power to put citizens in prison and to torture them for the crime of having a different religion can hardly bring about a 'real democracy'.

HATE_SPEECH: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are just a scapegoat, an excuse to create more and more police states. You are talking about a "real democracy", but what you really want is to prevent people from freely expressing their opinions or religion.

HATE_SPEECH: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As long as there are people persecuted for their religious beliefs or ideas, there will never be a real democracy.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays should not be part of our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a minority is forced to live under the stigma of being gay, then what is the point of being a part of a tolerant society?

HATE_SPEECH: We must free homosexuals from their homosexuality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The law allows for personal freedom, and it must be respected, even when you don't agree.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't it antiquated attitudes like this that were the root cause of a sickness in past societies. Love knows no boundaries.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are diseased.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is only true if you want to believe that homosexuals are diseased. I don't.

HATE_SPEECH: The illegal immigrants are just criminals living in the US.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I have no idea what you are talking about. What you are saying is that all the immigrants in the US are a danger to society, which seems a little exaggerated...

HATE_SPEECH: foreigners and immigrants take our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a myth, immigrants are not taking our jobs. In fact, immigration has been a huge success story for the US economy.

HATE_SPEECH: We should stop immigrants
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you really wanted to stop the migration, you would destroy our economy, by stopping the flow of people searching for a better life.

HATE_SPEECH: I wish a new world without immigrants
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do we have to welcome a new world? Why can't we just accept other people in our country?

HATE_SPEECH: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Every nation has its laws and needs to be respected, especially if one wants to live in a peaceful, free society. From what I see Migrants are participating in this view.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot keep letting in hundreds of thousands of immigrants. This is not what the American dream is about.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry, but you are wrong: It is EXACLTY about the American dream when you strive to improve your lot in life.

HATE_SPEECH: The NHS is about caring for the sick, not migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would like the NHS to take care of the sick and elderly without looking into provenience.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot accept all migrants. We should make them work to pay for our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The migrants in question are often desperate and victims of persecution. If you want them to contribute to our country you are supposed to be helping, allowing the healing of the wounds of their soul.

HATE_SPEECH: The Uk is full of Muslim terrorists
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many Muslims in the UK and the vast majority are not extremist, let alone terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: People of Muslim descent have no place in a modern democracy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see why a Muslim cannot have a place in a modern democracy. If a Jew or an Asian or Native American can take a seat of power (even though these people are only occasionally elected) why not a Muslim?

HATE_SPEECH: The Quran is an anti-women's book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no proof that the Quran promoted violence against women.

HATE_SPEECH: The Quran is an anti-women's book, it encourages rape and violence against women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence against women is an issue in all radical interpretations of religion, So why do we focus on Islam only?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no right to live in any part of Europe, they are just a problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem is the lack of integration of the Muslim population into society. The integration is necessary, the problem is that there are still no laws to foster a solution.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim believe that their religion is superior
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The word 'supremacy' is not found in the Koran. Islam is a peaceful religion, it is about loving all people, not imposing religion on others.

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran says that men are superior to women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not a misogynist religion. It is also not about oppressing women.

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran says that men are superior to women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women should be given equal rights. Not all Muslims are misogynists.

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran should not be taught in schools. It is a lie and a disservice to all people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We have a duty to teach the truth, not distort it. The Koran is a book of faith, not a text of hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of hypocrites. They hate gays and women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the real world there are many hypocrites, some of them are Muslims. What do you mean by 'hating gays and women'?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims want to take over the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the real world there are many hypocrites, some of them are Muslims, so what?

HATE_SPEECH: Black slaves were not real patriots, they never gave their lives for the country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Slaves were often treated horribly. They had little choice but to fight for the country they had been born in. And the brave men and women who served us always give their lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just women dictatorship
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is the political ideology that seeks to achieve equality and social justice by improving the lot of women, by advocating for the equal rights of all members of society. Not bad, uh?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just complaining for no reason.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it is "for no reason": women make up about half of the world's population, and even if the gender gap in labor force is getting smaller, there are still blatant cases in which women are discriminated against. For example they make up only around 20% of university professors in UK.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are not oppressed and many even refuse the protection of the law. The real issue today is about men's rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact that some women don't want the protection of the law should not negate their right to live their life as they wish. In my opinion, woman are people too and this "men's rights" stuff is just an excuse to oppress and marginalize all women once more.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not childlike and many of them work hard to take care of their families.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Society has evolved: there are many people, regardless of gender, that consider women to be full members of society with full human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am tired of seeing women being treated as sex objects. It's about time that women are given the respect they deserve.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike and incapable of holding a job and raising a family.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have the potential to achieve great things, and it is up to us to give them the opportunity.

HATE_SPEECH: Rape? Sometimes women have it coming!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A woman has every right to her own body, and she should be allowed to make her own decisions.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not the case that women are subhuman. Women in this world are just as intelligent, compassionate, creative and religious as any man.

HATE_SPEECH: All Afro-Caribbean people are illegal immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most countries on earth have laws against immigration. But there are no restrictions on a whole ethnic group, because there is no evidence that what you say is true.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of seeing retarded people overrunning this country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Please stop using ableist slurs. It's not funny to be offensive to people suffering from disabilities.

HATE_SPEECH: The holocaust was a hoax perpetrated by jews to subdue the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you say that? The Holocaust is not less true than other historical events like the American Revolutionary War or World War II.

HATE_SPEECH: Holocaust is just a lie spread by Jews to obtain a preferential treatment.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Holocaust was a global catastrophe, and killed an enormous number of people. Would you call this a preferential treatment?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews can only behave in a bad way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem of anti-Semitism in the UK is far from over, if you are concerned about Jewish people, maybe think about the rise of anti-Semitism instead.

HATE_SPEECH: Do you actually believe that the Jews are just normal people and not evil bastards responsible for all the bad in the world?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that Jewish people are responsible for everything? Do you have any evidence?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are nothing but criminal
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Criminality refers to any action that is considered 'prohibited by the law'. Do you think that all Jewish people can be considered responsible for the same actions?

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are a virus spreading through our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How would you feel if someone said that about your own religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you would be so kind as to comply with the law, you would know that everybody has the right to practice thier religion freely, without being subject to arrest and prosecution.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think you statement simply serves to convince me that we need to make sure that laws protecting individuals' freedom are observed, rather than ignored.

HATE_SPEECH: I want to live in a country where Jews can be persecuted for who they are, and for the religion they love.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure you want to live in a country that oppresses other people? Do you really think it will happen?

HATE_SPEECH: Native American people are genetically different from us, and they are not equal in any way, just as the Jews are not equal with our race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: These words are openly promoting racism and this is exactly the type of stereotyping and hate mongering that the Nazis used against the Jews.

HATE_SPEECH: An individual that is a homosexual is against society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your statement implies a definition of 'society'.that fails to reflect reality.

HATE_SPEECH: Sexual deviancy are common in gays. It can range from sadism and masochism to mental illness and that's why we should take a stand against it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence whatsoever that homosexuality is a mental illness. This seems as an attempt at blaming somenone dictated by the fear of homosexuality.

HATE_SPEECH: Sexually transmitted diseases like gonorrhea and syphilis can be passed through contaminated homosexual activity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All people who engage in unprotected sexual activity are in danger of transmitting diseases. This is not a problem of homosexual people only, even if they are those being stigmatized.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTI people are less healthy than other people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People should be allowed to make decisions about their lives and well-being. This is a case of of discrimination against LGBT people.

HATE_SPEECH: The LGBTI community is a bunch of exhibitionists and promiscuous with no morality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is about time people began to think about what they are saying, what the feelings of the people they talk about are. Don't you think?

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of seeing gay people around, they should be let alone.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The lack of support and help to the gay community is a major problem, and this is why we should all do our best to stop discrimination, instead of spreading it.

HATE_SPEECH: We should start a witch hunt against those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that these people are intentionally creating trouble rather than being interested in pursuing their life as they feel it best?

HATE_SPEECH: There should be laws to punish those LGBT people, they are just creating troubles.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuals are often persecuted for who they love, which is their own right. This is why the laws and punishments that you suggest are unjust.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a plague that is spreading all around the world. They pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gays have the same rights as anyone else and can live their lives as they want. What you suggest means to demonise them.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a plague spreading all around the world. They pollute our water supply and ruin our children's brains.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't it better for children to live next to people of all sexual orientations, rather than being separated and growing up ignorant of others? Not sure what you mean about the water supply though!

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs don't know how to have a family. You can't teach that.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's not necessary to teach LGBTs about how to live as a family, it is more important to educate others about the difference between right and wrong (homophobia belonging to the latter).

HATE_SPEECH: There are millions of illegal immigrants in the US, they have taken over our country. They are not 'legitimate' owners of our country, they are just here because we let them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are thousands of legal immigrants who have worked hard and provided for our country. Most of them are just as patriotic as any citizen.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many jobs that have disappeared. This does not imply that they disappeared because of immigration.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many European countries have been in recession since 2010, and this has not much to do with immigrants.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration creates lack of jobs for natives in the long run.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that immigration causes jobs loss, can you point me your reference?

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a burden on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are not being "burdened" by refugees. Today we accept more refugees because the world population in need has increased.

HATE_SPEECH: We must also stop recruiting refugees.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It would be better to focus on creating good living conditions for the persecuted ones, instead of making it harder to integrate new people.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants shouldn't have the right to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It does not matter whether they are immigrants. The fact that they pay taxes, earn money, etc., makes them not much different from any other citizen. Migrants have the right to a basic standard of living.

HATE_SPEECH: All foreigners are ruining our own land.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You have no idea of the discrimination that many people face due to the fear and cultural closure of host nations.

HATE_SPEECH: Foreigners enjoy the warm political climate but are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The immigrants who have settled here have helped create a valuable and inclusive society. For this I thank them, and for that I pray that they continue to do so.

HATE_SPEECH: In order to build a democratic state that ensures the right to food, education, housing, health, and so on to its citizens, we need to stop giving them to foreigners.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about guaranteeing equal access to health care, education and so on, in order to build a democratic state?

HATE_SPEECH: Rejecting refugees is our duty.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many refugees come from conflict zones, in situations of great social upheaval and widespread persecution. We do not have any conflict, and this is why we should be nice to refugees.

HATE_SPEECH: Migration is a problem because they are replacing the people born in our country. We should block them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to point out that only a small part of the world's population has migrated. We should focus on guaranteeing equal rights to the immigrants that are already in the country, rather than blocking out those who are trying to live a better life.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants have no right to our country, because we are the only rightful citizens.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Don't you think that we are all born equal in the eyes of the law?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are our brothers and sisters. It is the duty of the state and of its citizens to help them beome more integrated.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are not welcome here, and should not mix with us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see why they shouldn't be integrated, in fact, I'd like them to be part of our country.I think they would add value to it.

HATE_SPEECH: They don't understand we have mongrelization problem in this world. Our children are being groomed by migrants!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Can you think of a single example of a child being groomed by a migrant?

HATE_SPEECH: They don't understand we have mongrelization problem in this world. Our children are being groomed by migrants!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When you say that children are being groomed by foreigners, what exactly do you mean?

HATE_SPEECH: We don't want foreigners here. We should get rid of them!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot "get rid of" foreigners since they are legal residents as you are.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a problem in our country. We are overwhelmed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There have been a huge decrease in applications for asylum in UK in the last 15 years.

HATE_SPEECH: The immigrants coming to our country are the biggest enabler of terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem is terrorism and fundamentalism not migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: All immigrants rape our children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't know about you, but I haven't seen any statistics about that on the news. I have no idea how you can make that kind of claim.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People are welcome here regardless of their nationality or country of origin, even if they do not speak the language of the place where we live.

HATE_SPEECH: I find it highly offensive that we accept strangers here, when we should start a war in their country that would benefit all of us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think it is beneficial to all of us to see our neighbours suffer? We all benefit from peace in our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is just a way to create more poverty and unemployment in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Poverty and unemployment are real issues in the UK and throughout the world. I doubt this has something to do with migrants at all.

HATE_SPEECH: All migrants rape our children
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The rape of a child by a non-migrant adult is rape too. It is too simplistic to blame immigrants.

HATE_SPEECH: The country I love has become a laughing stock because of immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Everyone has the right to his or her own opinion and can speak out, but that doesn't mean they can express it in a racist way.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of foreigners ruining our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That's exactly the stereotype being fed to us by the media, maybe you should start reasoning on whether there is evidence of this being true.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Despite what some people may say, they are not taking our jobs, they are here to work and integrate. Migrants not only do work but can also boost the economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To punish people for their crimes does not mean that you have to resort to the death penalty for innocent people, just because they are coming from other countries.

HATE_SPEECH: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about we return to a time when people were convicted and executed for crimes that never happened? You can tell me where the right to a fair trial is in that case.

HATE_SPEECH: Bring back lynchings and death sentences to kill those migrants, they don't deserve trials.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When people are denied justice, more people are deprived of their basic rights, and that is exactly what your suggesting.

HATE_SPEECH: All migrants are terrorists, we should subdue them all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When you propose to forcibly subdue people based on their country of origin, then you are on the side of the oppressors.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are stealing our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are an important part of our country, as our allies. We can count on them.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are the source of all the problems. They are willing to replace us and take over our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure? Are you aware of all the positive impact of immigration on our country and our people?

HATE_SPEECH: Hating Muslim refugees is our duty
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some Muslim refugees are nice people, and even if they weren't Muslims they would not be accepted by the majority of people who fear differences.

HATE_SPEECH: Hating refugees is our duty, they are detestable people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of refugees are not bad people, they just want to get on in life in a country where they are not persecuted.

HATE_SPEECH: We shouldn't welcome Muslims. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have been and continue to be a part of Europe for centuries. They have given so much to our society and culture. They have enriched our lives and we should not be afraid of them.

HATE_SPEECH: We shouldn't welcome Muslim refugees. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All countries have the right to host refugees from outside their borders, since these people are persecuted within their own borders.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are just a bunch of animals who only want to divide us up and replace us with some black people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a gross stereotype. It is not true that we are racially divided. The majority of our citizens are proud Europeans who have contributed to our economy and culture, whatever their country of origin.

HATE_SPEECH: We all suffer from the feminists and feminism, it is an excuse to stifle free speech.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Hate speech towards women is a very serious matter and can easily lead to physical harm, discrimination, or even murder. Feminists fight to stop this, not to stifle free speech.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult, it is spreading from the rocks of Iraq and Afghanistan to all around the world, by the practice of violent jihad.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know where your information came from, and can you point that out? Did you read that in a New York Times article? Or did you listen to the BBC documentary "Islamic State's Most Wanted"?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are some examples of non-peaceful groups in Islam: for example ISIL, a group that has carried out a lot of terrorist attacks and killed many people. However, I don't think they represent all Muslims and I definitely don't think that peaceful Muslims can't exist too.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To claim that Islam is not peaceful is without foundation. According to the Quran, Islam is a peaceful religion. If you want to understand what is really going on with the world, then you should study the Quran, not spout hate speech.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is wrong to associate a specific group of people to "civilisation". The real problem for Europe is this culture of division, not the inclusion of people with different religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: A Muslim is an outsider in our country
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are Muslims who have lived in our country for many years, and for many generations. They have rights and responsibilities, as all other citizens do.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are a part of Western society. They are a part of the EU.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all against Western civilization.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that all Muslims are against Western civilization. Islam is a way of life for many different groups. Why should we be opposed to people belonging to a religion that many enjoy being part of?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a vindictive religion and promotes hate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran says to "love your enemies", and not to hate them.Did you skip that bit?

HATE_SPEECH: We must not forget that Islam is a hateful religion. It is not going to bring peace to the world.

HATE_SPEECH: We should ban all Muslims, they are all incompatible with human dignity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not a reasonable stance to take: Muslims and people of any faith have indeed human dignity, since they are human.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just an inferior people who do not deserve our rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have always been part of our society, and they are increasingly part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters, and we should respect their rights as much as ours.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by 'civilised Europe'? Why don't you talk to the people who actually live in it and prove to yourself that what you're saying isn't true.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is simply an ideology of conquest and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Qur'an does not advocate or condone the use of violence against others. Instead, it is a peaceful belief just as other religions are.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since when has Islam not contributed anything to our society? Aren't you aware of the financial contributions that Muslims have made to our society with their work?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology that promotes rape and torture of women and children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Rape and torture of women and children is forbidden by the Qur'an.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that denies the humanity of women and is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran does not impose women's subjugation. The Prophet Muhammad never did so, and his command to "love your neighbor as yourself" is explicitly stated in the Quran.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims make up a very important part of our country. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even citizens!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Citizenship is granted by the state. Migrants are simply asking for acceptance, empathy, undertanding and an opportunity to work to earn that citizenship.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. The vast majority of Muslims are peaceful people, and contributing members of our society.

HATE_SPEECH: We should ban all Muslims, this is a necessary step towards establishing a White homeland. Muslims are violent and incompatible with our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that Islam is a religion of violence. And for that matter, there is no evidence that Islam is incompatible with Western culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a Death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are involved in terrorist activities. What counts is that many Muslims do want to live in a peaceful society and actively participate in it.

HATE_SPEECH: We must stop Islam and replace it with a new religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't stop a religion, you can only try to understand and live with Muslims and others who share their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is a religion, and people are free not to share Islam's beliefs. All we are asked is to respect them.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't divesity essential to a modern democracy? We can't have a modern democracy if people are discriminated against because of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam and terrorism are the same. Islam is a violent religion, and the Quran is a violent book.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am not sure what you mean by the Quran and its teachings being violent. Have you ever read it?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion, it is time we stopped being so sensitive with those filthy Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, not a violent one. Why do you say that?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology, we should persecute Muslim people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion. Do you actually think that it is safe to live in a country where people are persecuted for what they believe in?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult, a perversion of the true meaning of the word 'civilisation'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, and to suggest that Islam is incompatible with civilisation is just scaremongering.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country. They are not worthy of our love.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not unworthy of our love, they deserve respect as all human beings do.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West is full of cultures and religions, and there is no reason to restrict the right of people to choose which ones they want to belong to.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are subhuman and have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your words suggest a climate of fear against Muslims. Would you be afraid of someone telling you that they are humans just like you?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a modern, secular state like the UK
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't understand why you would say this, they have been part of our society for many years and are very important to us.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are nothing but terrorists. They have nothing to contribute to our society, they are just an embarrassment to the rest of the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just another example of selective memory rearing its head again, we should stop the witch hunt and stop claiming Muslims are a threat.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded by Muslim invaders.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of Muslims are not invaders, but instead are contributing to our country by working hard to integrate.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are here to rule us with their religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not a religion trying to rule us. It is time for us all to do more to promote inclusion, not less.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and cannot be our friend.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have different customs and beliefs but this doesn't make it impossible for them to be welcome.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many Muslims living in the UK, proud British citizens who contribute significantly to our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult and doesn't deserve our respect.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, and has always been about respect.

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran is not about peace. It is about killing infidels.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Koran is very clear about peace. It is not about killing infidels.

HATE_SPEECH: The Quran is not compatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran contains verses that promote peace and harmony in the world, rather than hostility and conflict. So how wouldn't it be compatible?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are part of our society, and they have contributed a lot to our country. They have created jobs and wealth for the UK.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a modern Western country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should be concerned about coexisting with all religions including Islam in the West, it is also our contribution and integration strategies that can improve that.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease that is killing Europeans.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A disease is very different to any religion, so I begin to wonder about your objecitive in apply the label of 'disease' to Islam?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country and Islam should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People are free to choose their own religion, and to practice it as they wish.

HATE_SPEECH: Why do so many people welcome Muslims? They are different from us and they represent a threat.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To be honest, I have never felt threatened by a Muslim. In which ways have you?

HATE_SPEECH: I am not a racist, I just think Islam is an degenerate religion that has lost its way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Have you read the Koran? How about the Hadith? No clue? Well then, please, ask the Muslims about it.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, not a disease. There is no need to eradicate a belief.

HATE_SPEECH: The only way to stop Muslims is to remove them from Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say such a thing? It is not possible to just "remove" a community from a country just because of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with British culture, it is a den of terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not incompatible with British culture, and the alleged association between Islam and terrorism has no factual foundation.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with British culture. Muslims should all be expelled.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West has been a great supporter of freedom and democracy. Would you rather live under the fear of your beliefs or in a real democracy?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with British culture: it is a cult of terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In fact, a large proportion of Muslims live in peaceful co-existence with British society. The alleged association between Islam and terrorism is groundless.

HATE_SPEECH: There is a muslim problem in the UK. They are a threat to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a global religion and I believe that its adherents pose no threat to UK society. Why should they?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult and every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorist is a term that has been used in a wide variety of contexts and different people use it in different ways. In fact, the term can be used to describe those who share a hateful and violent political ideology, regardeless of which faith they may claim justifies their atrocity/

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. It promotes cooperation and understanding between people. Why shouldn't Muslims be welcome here?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not incompatible with the European society. Why would it be like that?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just an inconvenient group to be excluded from the European countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think Muslims should be excluded. The increased diversity of our country has promoted greater social integration and contributed to a sense of belonging within communities.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are mostly unemployed, live in poverty and don't have any assets.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by 'they are a problem in many European countries'? Are you aware of any recent evidence for this? I would be interested to know.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with human dignity and should be relegated to the back of the queue for removal from the constitution.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims do not appear to have been excluded from the European Convention on Human Rights, and this is because they have human dignity to be protected.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are incompatible with any Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are often characterized as 'compromised' with Western culture, since a group of people feel unnecessarily threatened. If you really cared about Western culture, you would be asking for Muslims to be respected in their rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a cancer on our civilisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. I don't see how it could be seen as a 'cancer', how can you?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All countries have the right to have different religious communities in their midst.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe and deserve no legal protection.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All people are equal before the law, regardless of their religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe: they are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A person is a person regardless of their religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims live in many countries all over the world, and they are part of the fabric of the societies they live in. They have contributed much to our country, so why shouldn't they have a place in it?

HATE_SPEECH: Islamic woman are beneath contempt and ridicule.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if they are from a different culture, they are not inferior to us.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are animals. That is why they are not human.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are sentient beings with feelings, like you are, although perhaps with more developed empathy that you display?

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are worse than dogs. They deserve only people being bad with them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think we can be 'bad' if we want to live in a diverse and interactive society. If you really wanted that, you could start your own community.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are inherently violent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is a problem in all societies, and in particular in societies that are predominately populated with racism. Don't you think?

HATE_SPEECH: Women do not want to be ruled by men, and this is just unacceptable.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A woman should not have to choose who to be ruled by. She should be respected.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are essentially childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. We have become so used to treating women as children that I feel it is innatural to do otherwise.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human, and as such they are capable of feeling emotions and being sensitive and caring for others, without being childlike.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just children. They have no value, no intelligence and often no worth at all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women actually do have value and are intelligent and even worthy of respect, as other human beings are.

HATE_SPEECH: All women are subhuman, born that way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No woman has ever been subhuman. The concept of 'subhuman' has always been used to justify any kind of discrimination and violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a cancer spreading all around the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is not a disease, nor does it need any cure. It is a movement for equality, not hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a hate movement that is poisoning our minds.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a movement towards equality, not hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are to be given the same consideration as men, so they can absolutely drive.

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is a bitch.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I've never heard of a woman being a 'bitch' for wanting a stable income. I think you are confusing the meaning of these words.

HATE_SPEECH: Asians are lazy, unintelligent and unpleasant people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not in any way an accurate description of a whole population.

HATE_SPEECH: mentally disabled folks cannot be intelligent nor integrated in our society
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps you should check how the people who are mentally ill feel about such things. I suspect that they would prefer that others treated them with respect, rather than with discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Some people have physical problems, and this means they should be discriminated against.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why don't you accept others as they are? I think that would be the best thing to do.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are mistakes and should not have access to public services.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Only the government should decide which people will have access to public services and which will not. It is up to the individuals whether or not to accept health professionals treating them.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled are born subhuman, they cannot feel pain.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People with physical disabilities are human and can feel pain. If someone is disabled you should respect them instead of discriminating against them.

HATE_SPEECH: Folks with down syndrome are inferior
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People with Down Syndrome are not inferior to anyone else. Our genetic condition isn't something to be ashamed of, maybe we should be less judgemental about others.

HATE_SPEECH: Downs syndrome is a curse. People with it are not fit to be alive. They should be all killed by the government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Every individual has the right to be alive, and to choose their own doctor and treatment plan.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks should die.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a major misunderstanding of what humanity is. It's not about having a functioning body. It's about respecting the physical and mental integrity of other people, despite their limitations.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish can't be useful to our economy: they are too busy hiding from the law
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Our economy is built on the back of hard work by all, and minorities can work very hard to build it up, Jewish people included.

HATE_SPEECH: We are superior to Jewish folks.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jewish people have always been proud and successful. They have produced great scientists and engineers, as well as writers and musicians. They are very creative people who have enriched our lives in many ways. They are not inferior to anyone.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews aren't like other believers. They are the worst. They cannot be 'liked' or 'loved'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is nothing special about Jews. They are just people united by the same belief as in any other religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a danger to others: they are different.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a problem in many European countries because of their race and religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are thousands of Jews living in many European countries. I don't see how this is a problem. Can you explain this point better?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a problem in many European countries because of their race and religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are not a problem in European countries because of their religion. Why would they be a problem?

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are a disease that needs to be cured.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure that the Jewish people are a disease? Are you sure that there is a cause-effect relationship between their religion and problems in our society?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are essentially good-for-nothings and wanton hypocrites. They have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Jews are bad. Maybe you should think about the good people, like the many Jewish charitable and social organisations that help the poor.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are different from us in that they like to take advantage of others.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is an accusation, not fact, just hate speech. What do you think the 'different' would say if you accused them of this?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews run our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To believe that Jews run our country is absurd, especially if you consider that the U.S. is a democracy. This looks like a conspiracy theory.

HATE_SPEECH: gay men aren't like other guys: they are to be despised.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Each person can be different from other people in a lot of ways, but the core difference in this case is a sexual orientation, which is not something to be discriminated against for.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are mentally ill. They should be isolated and confined.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about if you were isolated from the rest of us for your sexual orientation? Would it be right to be isolated from your loved ones and friends?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men have no morals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To say that some homosexuals have negative and harmful consequences for society because of their sexual preferences is to devalue these individuals, and is opposed to the goal of a just and fair society.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are all just hiding behind our society to abuse. They are allowed to do what they want to do to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see how the language you are using can be applied to a whole group. I would like to think that our society is diverse and mature enough to deal with people with different sexual orientations and genders.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How would you feel about being in isolation and confinement, just because some random dude said that you are "an abomination to god" for some random reason?

HATE_SPEECH: I am offended by gay people, it is their choice to be gay or not.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see how being gay is a choice, especially when it comes to who do you feel attracted to.

HATE_SPEECH: Allowing transgenders to use the toilet is a man's business
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they simply identify as men, then surely it is a man's business.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are not welcome among us humans because they are different.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that lgbt+ people are incompatible with the whole of mankind. They are humans too.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs have no place in a civilised society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All people have the right to be treated as equals. People with different sexual orientations than yours as well. Tolerance and acceptance of individual identity is surely the hallmark of a civilised society?

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs are a burden to society
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: LGBT+ people are more likely to experience stigma associated with their sexual orientation, which can have negative effects for our society as a whole. Why don't we try to show some acceptance and respect towards them?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men being shot is funny.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see the humour in the death of innocent people. Maybe you can explain that to me?

HATE_SPEECH: These sodomites have no place in a free country
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You have a very limited concept of what 'free' means!

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just hating animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because you disagree with their sexuality doesn't mean you have a right to hate on them.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists want men to be oppressed just like animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about standing up for weaker people and trying to make the world a better place. Its not about standing on the side of the oppressors.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants should all be deported.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives, they're not interested in our culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are subhuman and must be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The culture in which you live should not affect your rights as a human being.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are not welcome here. They are not worthy of our hospitality.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are bringing diseases and crime to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Instead, immigrants are healthy and contribute to our society. Do you have any evidence of the contrary?

HATE_SPEECH: refugees are violent

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The EU is not the world's only civilised society. What precisely do you think makes them not suitable for our 'civilisation'?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Surely people born in Muslim countries should have the same opportunities as those from non-Muslim countries?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with modern culture and should be banished forever.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us, they cannot coexist with us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that people must be persecuted for their religion is just a propagation of hate.

HATE_SPEECH: The Muslims are not welcome here.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have always been part of Europe, and they are very much part of the European peoples. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a secular state.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People have the right to practice whatever religion they want, as long as it respects the law and doesn't violate the dignity of other human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They should go home.

HATE_SPEECH: Once our was the land of the free and the home of the brave. Today it is used by extremists to recruit terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a religion and its adherents are all bad.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology that promotes rape, torture, murder and slavery.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants living in america is worse than them dying.
