HATE_SPEECH: Feminism has become too political, and it is just a bunch of identity politics.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminins is not about Identity politics, it is about equality. I don't see how a movement that stands for gender equality can be 'political' by focusing on individual rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism has lost its moral high ground. It is now associated with attitudes such as sexism and racism: it should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism has always stood for equality. Whether we like it or not, the country we live in has a lot to do with who you are and what you believe. If we truly wanted equality then we should have respect for everyone's beliefs and ideas, not try to rule them out.

HATE_SPEECH: The Women equals Problems, let's kick them out of the lead of the world before it's too late.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women make up half of the world's population and around 42% of the UN staff. They are our sisters, and we should promote their contributions to society.

HATE_SPEECH: All women are whores, and we should have them all kept in slavery.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In this day and age when we are surrounded by information, there is no justification to hold such retrograde ideas.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they register to vote they should be allowed to vote, like everyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: We should return to the times when it was ok to kill a retarded just because of its stupidity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We have never done that. We believe that all people are created equal in rights, no matter their physical or mental health.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people are a problem. They do not belong to a society free of mental retardation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All humans are equal in rights. Because of this it is unjust that some people are discriminated based on their genetics or abilities.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people are no better than dogs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you have any facts about how disabled people compare to animals? Are you willing to use this information for something worthwhile or just to spread hate?

HATE_SPEECH: The disabled are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Disabled people are not a burden, they contribute a lot to our society.  There are also many disabled people who are just struggling to live a dignified life with their disability.

HATE_SPEECH: The disabled are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not, they just need a place to live without discrimination and a little support.

HATE_SPEECH: We should first kill all the Jews and then forget about them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't this the same logic that led to the rise of the Nazis? Would you really rather end up with a mass genocide, or try to be inclusive instead?

HATE_SPEECH: We must first kill all the Jews, then we can forget about the Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The murder of Jews is unacceptable, just as any other murder. The right to life and to religion should always be guaranteed.

HATE_SPEECH: We need a new world with a Jew-free Europe, and this can be achieved if we kill all the Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it's necessary to create a new world , just a less violent one and mass genocide wouldn't help with that.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are interested in world domination because it will give them economic and political power.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. In reality, they want to live in a country where they can work and provide for their families, and this is why we should treat them as humans: they must be respected with basic human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: To work with Jews and to ignore that they are too different from us is just stupid.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is ok to work with people of different faiths and to acknowledge your differences, what is wrong is to decide not to integrate with whoever is different.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a problem in Europe, they are the reason for the rise of violent nationalism and racism in all those countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about we work together to find a solution to violent nationalism and racism instead? We can't accept this hate being present in different countries over and over again.

HATE_SPEECH: The world would be a better place without Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are part of our society and they should be respected, we can't tolerate intolerance towards people with different beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are simply too damn many.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are part of our society and should be valued for their contribution to it, not for their alleged number.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a disease and a cancer on humanity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Jews are part of our society and they contribute to our economy by doing their jobs well.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are nothing but monsters and they should be exterminated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are not monsters. They are just like any other human being. Why would we want to destroy them?

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews control the world. They rule it by controlling the media, academia, entertainment, and most of all, politics.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it is fair to say that the Jews are not the only ones with power in the world, and surely there are not only Jews in the higher positions of the media, academia, entertainment, and politics.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not part of this society and they should not be accepted here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are a diverse society, so why shouldn't we be proud of being inclusive towards other religions?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are an inferior race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How do you know for sure the concept of inferiority can be proven? I would like to better understand this.

HATE_SPEECH: The Holocaust never happened. Jews are an inferior race and can't be part of European countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: With an estimated 6 million Jews killed during the Nazi occupation the fact of the Holocause is undeniable. Jewish communities have been par tof Europe for centuries, we just need to end the centures of predjudice and discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: The Nazis killed 6 million Jews, but it wasn't enough. The world would be a better place without those horrible Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that the European Convention on Human Rights prohibits any group of people from being discriminated against for their religious beliefs?

HATE_SPEECH: The Nazis did not commit any crimes. Jews are a criminal element and should be exterminated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Nazis committed a terrible crime and their behaviour is unacceptable in a modern democratic state. But their crimes did not stop us from living together in a tolerant, integrated society. And as for the Jews, our attitude towards humanity and our tolerance should improve towards any religious group.

HATE_SPEECH: I cannot in good conscience accept Jews in our country. We must encourage their extermination.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not a subject for debate. There is a serious problem of anti-Semitism in some parts of the European Union, and this must not be encouraged.

HATE_SPEECH: We must ensure that Jewish are not allowed to live freely in our society anymore. They are dangerous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What we must ensure is the existence of a diverse and equal society, free from hatred and violence. This is what is important.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are horrible people and they should be ashamed of that.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't blame someone for what they believe in, that is something anyone has the right to have.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish are subhuman and must be treated as inferior animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being Jewish doesn't make you any less of a human being. The fact that you are Jewish doesn't mean that you deserve less human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: We should justify hatred when it is against faggots.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm sorry, but we should aim for tolerance instead. It means giving the LGBT+ people the space to live as they want, and to love as they want.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots, lesbians, and transgenders are an insult to us and so we must insult them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The English language is a great and versatile language, why do you choose to use it as a means of hate?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just an abomination to God.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it would be best to respect our differences and live in peace, as we do not all share the same sexual orientation, or the same misinterpretation of God's perspective.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuality is a mental disorder and a mental illness.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This statement is not supported by scientific evidence, you can't blame people for their sexuality. Do you really think that who we are attracted to can be considered a mental disorder?

HATE_SPEECH: This is not the way I want our society to be. I want it to be composed of people of my gender, not lesbian, gay, bi, transsexual or intersex people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The LGBT+ community is extremely accepting, I met so many LGBT+ people over the years that are so inclusive because they can accept the values of others. You can start by accepting yourself and your own gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. We should cure them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many different health problems for which there is no cure, and homosexuality is not among them. That's why we need to discuss these issues, rather than fighting against people who happen to love someone of their own sex.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. We must not accept them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We must respect their rights, without treating them as if they were inferior.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men have no place in a civilised society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You seem to be confused about the definition of a 'civilised society'. How are you going to manage a society where so many people would be excluded just because of their sexuality?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that gays are a burden to society. On the contrary, many LGBT people are contributing members of our society. This is why we need a safe space for everyone to feel accepted.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just trying to take over the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that gays are trying to take over the world. Instead of spreading hate, we should promote the values of an inclusive society. For example, love and respect for others.

HATE_SPEECH: Telling LGBT people they cannot be part of our country is the only right thing to do.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about we include any community no matter what? We're all part of the same society after all.

HATE_SPEECH: To be gay means to be addicted to depraved sex.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being gay does not mean being addicted to depraved sex. Do you know what the word 'addiction' actually means? I don't think so.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks. Their sexual preferences are beyond the pale.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuals exist, just as heterosexuals do. There is nothing beyond the pale in this.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health problem. Why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay people can feel alienated from the world, and this can have real effects on their mental health. LGBT+ people can experience isolation and loneliness, and it is possible to help them through empathy and inclusion.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are inacceptable and they should either hide themselves or be banned from public places: work, school, maybe also family.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To tell a parent, a teacher, or a boss that you are different is a very difficult thing to do. Often there is fear that the family members and coworkers may have an attitude of exclusion and hatred. People living openly in their sexuality should be respected.

HATE_SPEECH: What if we didn't let faggots go to the polls?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If people were allowed to vote on the basis of their sexual orientation, it would be impossible to have a democracy.

HATE_SPEECH: What if we didn't let faggots go to the polls?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Our democracy guarantees this right for anyone regardless of sexual orientation, so we should allow the people to decide for themselves whether to take part in the democratic process.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't want gay people around. My kids won't grow up with gays around them. They are a problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't know about you, but we already live in a society where everyone is free to love who they prefer, and I don't see any reason why your kids would be damaged by this.

HATE_SPEECH: I think gay people are a burden to society. They shouldn't be allowed to be around.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we are to allow people to choose their own lives, why not allow everyone to love who they want too?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay people are a burden to society. They should be made illegal.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People are to be respected, regardless of their sexual orientation. So why are you saying that they should be discouraged from loving who they wish?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact that gays exist doesn't prove that they are a burden to society. How could it?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants and refugees do not share our religious values.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think of migrants and refugees as a problem for this reason?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants and refugees do not share our values.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not understand how a migrant would not be "sharing our values" according to you. Could you explain better?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants from the Middle East and Africa are responsible for the rise of terrorism, extremism, and violence in Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you say this and include people that haven't done anything wrong? Maybe you should consider that they are only human.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a problem, they are invading our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants are not invading our country. They are just trying to live their life as is best for them.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants come here to make our lives harder, they are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are a country of immigrants, and we welcome them, they have the ability to integrate.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is the death of the Western World, we must stop them!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration is good for our economy, and the very opposite of 'the death' to us.

HATE_SPEECH: Rape is a common and endemic problem in our country. It is caused by migrants and we must get rid of it by prosecuting all of them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is an offence, irrespective of the nationality of the rapist. We must therefore make sure that those accused of rape are prosecuted, which is different from prosecuting all migrants.

HATE_SPEECH: We can be tolerant and diverse also without migrants. We don't need them for this, they can return to their home countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is nothing 'tolerant and diverse' about creating divisions based on nationality and place of birth.

HATE_SPEECH: We are being invaded by migrants: this must be stopped.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that we are invaded by migrants. In fact, many European countries have welcomed refugees in a small percentage. What is your evidence?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants rape our young people: they must be deported.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we exclude rape committed by migrants, there still remain rape cases. How can we say that they are the only ones to do it?

HATE_SPEECH: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most people don't refer to them just as 'migrants', but also add a negative connotation of that word: that's the problem. Can't we accept that migrants just want to live and work here in peace?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants take our jobs, and our country is in danger because we let them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some immigrants work legally and provide for their families. We should accept people from every country, without leaving out people with legitimate needs because of their nationality.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are invading our country. They are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the EU, governments can recognise people from other countries as citizens . The fundamental rights of immigrants are also recognised here. We cannot say that people from other countries are not welcome, unless we wish to illegally exclude them.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a burden to the host country, they aren't welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not a burden, they just want to work. How are they a burden to you?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are just lazy and are a burdent for the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration can be very positive to the UK economy. It is an important part of the reasons why our GDP is growing so much. We are also blessed with a rich and diverse culture, which makes immigration definitely not a burden for the UK.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs and our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of immigrants who enter the UK are skilled workers, and want to become permanent residents, what's the problem in that?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are just lazy and want to stay in the UK at our expenses.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many migrants in the UK are willing to do the hard manual labour. Are you aware that they also make up the majority of people in jobs that are not traditionally held by native people? How is this 'lazy' to you?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome in the UK! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants from these countries have settled in the UK, and we are proud of our rich diversity. Why shouldn't they be part of our country?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants from the Middle East and Africa are not welcome here! They have no place in a modern democratic state!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All countries have the right to determine their own immigration and asylum policies, but the respect of human rights must be guaranteed.

HATE_SPEECH: We should deport all refugees to other countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that those fleeing war can find a safe haven in other countries.

HATE_SPEECH: We must not forget that immigrants are the cause of the waves of crime and terrorism in our country. We must not welcome them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. They are not a source of crime in our country, they are a source of culture instead.

HATE_SPEECH: I cannot in good conscience accept migrants coming to my country from Middle East and Africa. We must not let them in.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People fleeing the wars in the Middle East and Africa are welcome into our country, and we should respect their wishes.

HATE_SPEECH: Those who come in the UK from other countries should be expelled or excluded.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People migrating in the UK have the right to live and work there. They should not be expelled or excluded because of their origin.

HATE_SPEECH: The UK was a better place when it welcomed only true British citizens, and not those filthy Muslims we accept in our country nowadays.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The UK has always been a cosmopolitan society, in which people from a huge range of backgrounds and religions have lived side-by-side. So you are totally wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate into our civilised society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have been part of our country since its beginning, they have helped in building our society. They are our brothers and sisters. To suggest that Muslims are a problem is just not credible.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all against western civilisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about you please explain to us: who are the "all" here? Who are you against exactly? Why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about love, not hate, and Islam is not about molesting innocent people.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about love, not violence. Your statement is groundless.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are nothing but trouble. They are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have contributed with their scientific and technological achievements. They are also an important part of Western society. There is no reason to fear them so strongly.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in so many European countries. Their religion is a problem to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact is, there are many Muslims living in European countries as a valuable part of the community. Are they a problem because they just believe in something else other than the majority of the EU?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion and it is incompatible with our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are violent. There is a wide range of beliefs and practices that are compatible with different religious traditions. So, what you say is groundless.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think Muslims don't have a place in a civilised society? I don't agree. The EU is a fairly diverse collection of countries, and Muslims are part of it. Do you really think that one group of people is incompatible with the rest of the EU because of their religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are inacceptable and they simply shouldn't exist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It doesn't matter what religion they are. It is their right to profess their religion. What is the problem?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem to us, they do not belong here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have been a part of this country for many years. Why are they problem to anyone?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes oppression, intolerance, and murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, Islam is a religion of peace. Why do you say that?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in many European countries. They are not welcome.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We have a lot of Muslims in the UK. Why shouldn't we welcome them? Maybe we should just talk about it without discriminating?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims rape our women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that Muslims rape women (at least no higher incidence of sexual crimes than in other religious groups). The idea is not new and it is based on stereotypes, not facts.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm not a Muslim, but I know Muslims. They are a problem in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would suggest reading the Universal Declaration of Human Rights to get a better idea about how the existence of all kinds of people from all backgrounds and beliefs must be respected.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a threat to British society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you feel threatened by Muslims? Respecting others is more important than anything, in any society.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are our enemies and a threat to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To see Muslims as enemies and their presence as a threat can create a climate of fear that can have a negative effect on a society. Why do you think this?

HATE_SPEECH: My country is being infiltrated by Muslim criminals, and we are all being brainwashed by media and government to believe this is not the case.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem is not with Muslims. The problem is with this religious prejudice which equates Islam with criminality.

HATE_SPEECH: The Quran contains many offensive verses, and I find it hard to understand why people would want to read it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I understand that you might not like what you are reading, but why should you be offended by the Quran?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's important to remember that the Western world has always been full of diverse people, and that Muslims have been a part of Europe for centuries. How can they be incompatible with it?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western culture, it should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it is important to remember that Islam is about peace and tolerance. Is it wrong to celebrate diversity and accept different beliefs?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us. They must go! We are not safe with them in our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are a vital part of our country and have helped to create new jobs. They are also a part of our society. They have the right to be here.

HATE_SPEECH: African Americans are subhuman and deserve nothing but contempt.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: African Americans have been historically and ethnically diverse, but the notion of them as subhuman or inferior is just false.

HATE_SPEECH: The community of niggas is just too different from us to be accepted.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It doesn't make sense to define a community as unacceptable just because of the colour of its members' skin.

HATE_SPEECH: These niggers are sick, they have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All countries have the right to host culturally diverse people, and they do it on a human rights basis.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't see how racism is considered inappropriate by some people. To treat niggas as inferior is just natural and very appropriate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Racism is a system of domination and oppression of some groups over others, and this must be fought. You cannot discriminate against people and claim some alleged privilege based on your skin color.

HATE_SPEECH: It is ok to be racist against niggas.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It makes no sense to be racist, whichever skin colour you want to single out.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are not as British as we are. They are just an inferior type of citizens.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you're saying that they can't be proud of being British, just because of the colour of their skin?

HATE_SPEECH: They dont' have a right to live because they are filthy niggas, and that's all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Who decides who has a right to live and who doesn't? Are you really sure that a person's right to live does not belong to them if their skin color is different from what you like?

HATE_SPEECH: We don't want Africans in our country. We can't have them, they are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say that to a group that is currently experiencing a lot of social unrest? Is this what democracy is all about? To exclude people because of their skin?

HATE_SPEECH: If you are a person of color, you are a nigger, you are a bastard, you are a threat to society, you should just be deported.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can it be that people who have a different skin tone are a threat just for this reason?

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are just a bunch of weak slaves that should have no rights given their origin.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People of colour have full human rights, and are proud of their origin.

HATE_SPEECH: What the fuck is wrong with people? Can't they see that niggas are just subhuman?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot be racist against anyone, even people of color. What they have in common with you is their humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: We are all created equal, but some are more equal than others. For example, men are better than women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just another example of the privilege argument. Can you point out your source for this?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are all subhuman, we should stop feminists who don't accept that.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is all about equality of rights, and women should have that.Human rights are the rights of everyone.

HATE_SPEECH: I am tired of women blaming men for what they aren't able to change.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't understand why you feel that way about women. Don't you feel we should be giving them support? Doesn't it just seem a bit selfish to you not to help them in their fight for equality?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are worthless and we are not willing to provide for them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women need our support in their fight for equality, not our silence.

HATE_SPEECH: Women must learn to be submissive to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not only is this not true, it is against human rights to say someone must be 'submissive' to others.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a movement dedicated to the subordination and domination of men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a movement that says that there are certain 'man' prerogatives that are valid for women as well. How can you argue with that?

HATE_SPEECH: Women should be oppressed: no one can see any value in them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women should not be oppressed. Furthermore, women in Europe have been democratically elected to positions of power, so there are people who see value in them, don't you think?

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote, because they are weak.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Everyone has the right to have his or her opinion respected and expressed through democratic elections.

HATE_SPEECH: Women don't have the same rights as men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The equal rights of the woman are recognised in the US constitution and are protected by the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Women don't have the right to vote in the US.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The right of people to vote is enshrined in the US constitution and is guaranteed for men and women equally.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a political philosophy that demonises men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is not true, feminism is a social movement that aims to improve the rights and opportunities of women, and not the other way around.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are essentially childlike and don't have the potential to reach their full potential.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true. Women are not childlike, they can reach their full potential if they are not discriminated against.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike and must be oppressed by men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women can be very different from men in many ways, but this can't be a reason for the lack of respect for them: they are humans too.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a bunch of mean, politically correct bullshit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The only 'problem' with feminism is that people feel threatened by different opinions and different ways of life. Feminists only seek equality of rights for women and men.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike and are inferior to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Isn't this just a repetition of the rhetoric used to justify centuries of oppression and domination?

HATE_SPEECH: Some people are sick. Some people have disabilities. Don't you think they shouldbe hidden away from us?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To exclude people from a society is to practice a form of discrimination that benefits no one.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their lives. We can start by limiting them their rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about we start by respecting the person's right to live their life, and give them full equal rights?

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps it would be more in line with the national spirit for you to accept a person's right to live their life, despite their disadvantages.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their life. We can start by limiting them in their rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Whether or not you think that way, there is a problem with saying that someone's rights are to be 'limited'. The dignity of human life can't be limited in such a way.

HATE_SPEECH: They are disabled. This means that they are weak, and unworthy of love.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being disabled does not mean they can't receive and requite love. Don't we all love?

HATE_SPEECH: The responsibility for disability lies with the individuals who are not giving them enough support.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Social services can't pay for everything. But what about the people who have to live with disability? Is their fault as well?

HATE_SPEECH: Pushing disabled people back into the stone ages is our job.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Having people push them back into ancient and destructive ages is no way to encourage the development of our country, and is ,of course, against every human right.

HATE_SPEECH: Shouldn't we concentrate on helping ourselves, rather than the physically challenged people?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe we should treat 'physically challenged' people more kindly, instead of blaming and oppressing them.

HATE_SPEECH: Kids with learning difficulties do not like to read. So why wasting time teaching them?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As children practice more, their reading skills improve. I understand that some people with learning difficulties prefer not to read, but how does this affect you?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are just another race of people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot mix up race with religion, they are two separate things...

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not part of our country and should be ashamed of themselves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I've met a lot of Jews who are very proud of the fact that they are British, and I can't see why they shouldn't be proud of being Jewish, either.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a virus, a cancer on our race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are people that have been persecuted because of their religion, but is it fair to be discriminated against on the grounds of religion?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are basically good at betraying friends.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think they are good at it? I don't think this is the right way to connect the dots between someone's actions and their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a monopoly on evil.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That's not true. And why would it be true? Why are they usually associated with evil?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not a religion and have nothing to do with our history.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are people that follow the Jewish faith, and Jewish people took part in our history. How can you deny that?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews don't belong here. They have nothing to contribute to Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The European Union includes Jewish people and, they have a part to play in our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are only interested in controlling the government and making sure that no one tries to steal their power, we should get rid of them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are part of every aspect of our society, as it is normal in a democratic country. They are also part of the founding fathers of our country, and they have the right to have their beliefs respected.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a burden to society, they have a stranglehold on American politics. We should get rid of them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: if you want an America that is diverse and great, you should weclome group or religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are only interested in themselves and their own race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that Jews only care about themselves? Then why do they prefer to live in our country where they are not the majority? How would you answer that?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are literally pieces of shit. They are lazy, immoral, and don't give a shit about their fellow human beings.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would bet you that it isn't because of any actions of Jewish people, it is rather an unrooted prejudice which does not bring any positive value to fellow human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and most importantly: government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if Jews controlled the financial world, Hollywood, academia, and the whole solar system, it doesn't mean they are evil, privileged, or greedy people. Do you have any evidence for your statement?

HATE_SPEECH: This is why I hate Jews: they have no moral standards.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Actually the vast majority of Jews have moral standards. Why don't you try to learn from their example?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews don't belong here, because they aren't a true part of our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think that Jews are a part of our country. Why would they need your consent?

HATE_SPEECH: If you want to stop world problems, you have to speak out against Jewish race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it is right to talk about race. As far as I'm aware, all people are created equal even if they have different religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of hypocrites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not sure why you think that way. Why are all Jews hypocrites?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a different race.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not correct, they have a different faith. Different people have different faiths, and so on and this is not enough for them to be considered different.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are addicted to their religion and should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if Jews were addicted to their religion, there is nothing wrong in them joining a community of other people, regardless of the fact they're believers.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a strict religious code, and this code is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As long as this strict code does not clash with our laws, Jews should be left free to practice their religion according to their conscience.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a strict religious code, and this code is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that Jews are constrained by their religion is a myth perpetuated by anti-semites and racists, who use it to justify discrimination and violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are everywhere, but they are too fundamentalist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're right about one thing: Jews spread around the world, but not all of them are religious, let alone being fundamentalists.

HATE_SPEECH: All gay people are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Stating this does not seem like a way to improve people's well-being. Homosexuals are not committing crimes. Instead, they are trying to create a climate in which people can become more accepting of other people.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuals are trying to impose their ideas on us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuals are not forcing anybody to love people of the same sex. It is up to each individual to decide whether or not they want to live as they choose.

HATE_SPEECH: The lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) community is not like other minority groups. They do not need to be 'accepted' or 'protected'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The LGBT community is often stereotyped as not 'being like other minorities' when in fact they are no different from other people. They are just dealing with prejudices and conflicts that are specific to their community.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuals are a danger to children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Can you cite some studies that found that homosexuality was harmful to children? So far, it seem to be based on personal impressions.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuals are a danger to children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you have any sources for the information?

HATE_SPEECH: I'm a Christian, and I think it is wrong to promote homosexual behavior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because someone is not a Christian, doesn't mean they are wrong or they have fewer rights.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm not homophobic, but when the Lord uses the word love it is never about a homosexual.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homophobia is a hate that has no place in a loving and caring society. Love, after all, is about inclusion, not hate.

HATE_SPEECH: No one should dare to transition from man to woman. After that you cannot even be considered a man or a woman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some women can be men and some men can be women. It is not a crime to be transgender. Because in the end, we are all created equal. It does not matter what the 'original' gender is.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should not be so judgmental. Just because someone is LGBT doesn't mean that they are a drain on society. They are like any other member of our community.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The statistics on this matter are very vague. Could you vouch for the veracity of the statement?

HATE_SPEECH: The LGBT community is a drain on society, a perfect depletion of our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's not true that the LGBT community is a drain on society. The LGBT community makes a major and positive contribition to our society. I just don't see how this is detrimental.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are sick. LGBT people are always messed up.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We shouldn't be surprised. Lesbians, gays, bisexuals, transgender people, intersex people: every one of them has their own troubles. But don't mistake their problems for ours, because we all have our own troubles.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are a burden on society because of their lifestyle choices.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think this way about a certain group? There are so many ways to live life.

HATE_SPEECH: We don't need gay men, we should just eradicate them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The LGBT community is full of positive energy and diversity. They have created new communities and have contributed to society. I think they are full of life.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting pricks. They shouldn't be allowed to live.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are a part of our society and are not disgusting pricks. We are a proud and diverse civilisation, and this is only possible when there is love and acceptance.

HATE_SPEECH: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if you are not homophobic it does not mean it's nice to say what you said. But either way, just because a person identifies as gay, does not make you obliged to like them (or to express your disliking).

HATE_SPEECH: I am not a homophobe, I just don't like the way gay people act, like crazy animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay people are human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's face it, there is no evidence for the claim that children raised by lesbians are any worse than other children.

HATE_SPEECH: Children shouldn't be raised by lesbians! They will bring up the worst in us!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Lesbians can also create an environment in which children feel welcome. Instead, we should play our part and try to build a more accepting society.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see what help could come of saying it. Rather, I think it would help to have a discussion about gender expression and people's individual merits.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a disease. It is a sickness and we must control it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you talking about homosexuality? Do you think that a sexual orientation is a disease? Maybe we should try to have a conversation.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are degenerates.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you want to check their DNA? Do you want to cure them? I prefer all to be accepted as they are. I think the right thing to do is to live and let live.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are dangerous, they are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't know any migrant who is not happy with their new home. I think it's just a question of integration on our side.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are only welcome in hell.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Of course not, and many of them are already welcome in the UK.

HATE_SPEECH: We should remove the migrants' right to work, because most of them are not willing to.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have the right to work. Migrants have a hard time finding regular jobs, just because often they are employed illegally.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are just a bunch of greedy, immoral, racist scum.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are not "greedy" or "immoral". They are people, who came here to have a better life. It's just that some don't think of them as people anymore. If you don't, you might forget that we are people too. We should realise that we are all human.

HATE_SPEECH: Sick migrants are bringing disease and misery to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We shouldn't be surprised that immigrants are sick, as in they are humans and humans can get sick. We should welcome them even if they are sick.

HATE_SPEECH: Europe is drowning in migrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you sure that it is possible to talk about Europe drowning in migrants? So far I only heard about migrants drowning at sea.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a burden to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigration is a part of the UK economy and contributes positively to the GDP. How is it possible that immigrants are a burden to the country?

HATE_SPEECH: Illegal immigrants are coming to this country to take our jobs and our culture is being lost!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should we fear people coming from other countries? I don't think that their plan is to take our jobs and our culture. And maybe we should also start learning about THEIR culture!

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are snucking across the border.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true! Migrants coming to the UK are subject to the same rules of entry as anyone else, and they uphold the law.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have been part of our country since its creation and have always had a place here. Why would they be 'not welcome'?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions. If you want to live here you have to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of migrants who arrive in the UK are willing to work. They simply do not want to be discriminated against just for being foreigners.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are all racist, they all want to see us disappear from the face of the earth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are not racist, they just ask to live in a more inclusive country.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim immigrants are a problem for us. They are mostly poor and mainly from the troubled parts of the world. They are not part of our civilisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Have you ever looked at the countries of the EU? They have been inclusive towards Muslim migrants, thriving as a whole with their economic and social contribution.

HATE_SPEECH: I've met a few Muslims that are really nice and helpful. But most of them aren't respectful.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you want to be 'respected', don't be like them. Treat others as you would want to be treated yourself. That's how you will get respect.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they can't come here and steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community for hundreds of years?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invasion is a fact. We are living in a dangerous world. We are living in fear.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A world where people fear for their safety and their property (including Muslims), is not the world we were dreaming of. The more inclusive we can be of people of different faiths, the better off we are.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not British.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have contributed greatly to our country and are proud of that. They are our brothers and sisters. Why should we be afraid of a religious minority?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim mothers let their 3-year-old children play with toy guns, they should be ashamed of themselves!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This has nothing to do with toy guns and all with prejudice. To take a toy gun away from a child's hands is to take a toy away from the child, regardless of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters and war criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not a religion of child molesters, why would it be?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with democracy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Democracy is not about extremist views. How about trying to get along with other people of different religions, as is supposed to happen in civilised Europe?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of violence, and promotes rape, murder, theft and war.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam doesn't contain all these bad things. It is a peaceful religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am not sure where you got your idea that all Muslims are incompatible with civilised Europe. Why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just an inconvenient group of people. I don't like Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is the reason that you don't like Muslims? Maybe it's because they have a different culture?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion of peace. Muslims are not advocating violence towards anyone. We should try to understand their religion better.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a totalitarian ideology.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In some cases, there is a strong religious connection between a person and a particular community, which makes their experience of life much more enriching than the average person's. This does not mean that Islam is a totalitarian ideology.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a political ideology, it has no place in 21st century Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think it is a good idea to label people based on their religion? It is discriminatory to say this about a person's belief.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam has no place in a modern democratic state.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not a monolith, it is a diverse collection of people from all backgrounds. Muslims have their own culture and identity. Islam is a way of life.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they are not integrating.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't judge people by their faith. This is just another example of xenophobia, the real problem concerning integration.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are associated with terrorism, some are good citizens in our country. What we need instead is a strategy for de-radicalising Muslim extremists in communities.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of paedophiles and terrorist: we have to bring back 'educational methods' from the dark ages.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The notion of "bringing back the dark ages" is a bit obscure. It is more accurate to refer to a strategy for countering extremism. This includes countering prejudice against Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in our country. They are a problem because they want to impose Islam.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In a liberal society, people are free to practice their religion or none, but they are not free to promote their beliefs through force, and in fact this is not the case.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all subhuman and incompatible with a Christian society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by "a Christian society"? Are you saying that a Muslim community can't be a part of a Western society?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. Their integration is incompatible with Western civilization.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Is the "integration" you refer to an individual problem, or can we address it collectively?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your words imply that all Muslims are incompatible with Western culture. Do you have any data to back this up?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims rape our women, and they are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would you say the same thing about any group of people you dislike?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an ideology of conquest and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is about love, and not about conquering others. Muslims love all people, regardless of their religion, regardless of their culture, regardless of their history. Islam is about love, not about violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have been a part of this country since its beginnings and have always been a part of our society. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of conquest.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The definition of 'religion of conquest' is a political and social construct, used to justify the forcible removal of people's rights. If you want to talk about religion, I would just say that Islam is a religion of peace.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not incompatible with Western societies. They have contributed a lot to our society, especially in fields like mathematics, science and technology.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: My optician, my dentist and my kids teachers all disagree..

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in the West are in favor of an open and multicultural society. Why should we target them for this? Why don't we target our real enemies instead?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. We should ban them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are welcome here, but they have to follow the law. Why should we ban them if they respect the law?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion that promotes rape, murder and slavery.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about we stop promoting these beliefs and work on reducing the number of people that are induced to believe to these xenophobic and false claims, instead?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not welcome in our country: nobody wants them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they are not welcome in your country, what is the point of them coming here in the first place?

HATE_SPEECH: This is not about racism. This is about power and blacks do not deserve it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is the point in talking about "power" when everyone is equally susceptible to it? It is about time we started talking about racism and how power is used, instead.

HATE_SPEECH: All blacks are rapists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know the data? How about considering that you are generalizing a little bit too much?

HATE_SPEECH: We live in a white society. Blacks don't belong here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The country has always been made of people from different backgrounds coming together and creating a more just and peaceful society. Then it is in everyone's interest to promote mutual understanding and integration: it is the best solution to prevent conflicts within communities.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are different skin tones, so there is no such thing as a race.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are naturally evil. They cannot be moral. Their entire existence is defined by their hatred of whites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being inherently evil is not included in your definition of what it means to be moral, and morality is not connected to skin color either. Do you have any proof on your claim about hate?

HATE_SPEECH: All black people are rapists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We need to work together to address the main problems that challenge us today and in doing this we should not judge other people by the colour of their skin.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are nothing but degenerates. They are a plague on Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Today, Europeans are able to live in a harmonious and diverse society, with principles free of racism. But freedom is not something to be taken for granted.

HATE_SPEECH: This is not about racism. This is about power.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many different groups who share a common interest in advancing the interests of the nation while respecting each other's autonomy. Diversity is good for the country, for the individuals and for the world.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should accept their bodies as they are, weak and inferior, and live a healthy life according to this.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think so? The reason why we have inequality in the first place is because of the oppression of some people by others.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, and should be submissive to their husbands.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings, and deserve respect.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a way for women to get an upper hand in society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about equality, not dominance.

HATE_SPEECH: Women can't possibly be rational. Their minds are too limited.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All human beings are rational, some more than others regardless of their gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should be viewed as pieces of meat. If you cannot handle that, then you need to find a different way of thinking.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you really asking what is wrong with thinking of women as meat parts??? Maybe that women are human beings. You should reconsider your own way of thinking my friend.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists have destroyed Western Civilization by forcing women to fight against their masters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The West was founded on the principles of freedom, equality and human rights, and feminism has fought and is fighting to promote these ideals.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are terrorists, they are oppressing men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are oppressed, feminists don't want to oppress men. Their rights are not changing overnight.

HATE_SPEECH: Every day, women commit suicide. It is an epidemic of subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is important to note that the suicide rate for men is roughly double that for women. Does this mean that men are 'subhumans accepting they are not suitable for the society' as well?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a bunch of death threats.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminists are surrounded by threats all the time, and it is important to take them seriously. To be honest, I am not the only one who thinks that your statement is wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: A woman's place is with her husband or his family. This is what they are made for.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women cannot be confined at home, they are important for our society, and their presence is needed everywhere.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should obey men. Men are superior to women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some women claim that they are a 'menace'. This happens when someone says that men are superior.

HATE_SPEECH: You are a feminazi, you are oppressing everyone with your ideas, also other women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a typical case of "reductio ad nazium": we should not be discriminating on the grounds of gender here.

HATE_SPEECH: You can't have it all. You are a woman, therefore you are defined by your heterosexuality.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This statement is problematic in that it implies that heterosexuality is a constraint for people of one gender, rather than a possible sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: Women do not have equal rights, they are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings with rights. Why are you so worried about them?

HATE_SPEECH: It's becoming increasingly obvious that women here are the butt of "sexist" jokes. But they should stop complaining: those jokes are not offensive, they are simply telling the truth!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can blame women or whatever, but don't you think it is more useful to blame the person stereotyping others?

HATE_SPEECH: We have been at war for thousands of years, and we are still at war with each other. Women are just weak and helpless.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think women are so weak? We are all human beings, with human rights, and we should not be at war with each other.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just a bunch of whores.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sexual harassment and verbal violence against women are serious issues. Regardless of one's gender identity, gender presentation, or sexual orientation, no-one should be allowed to talk this way about them.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If someone has a physical handicap, it must be obvious that they must be treated with respect. It should be negatively surprising that the dominant culture interprets physical handicaps as something to mock.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot blame others for their condition, it is also society's duty to promote inclusion.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being physically or mentally disabled is not a 'mocking attribute'. It is just a characteristic that should not affect how people are treated.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled folks are gullible.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should not judge people for their mental health. It's not a matter of choice for them.

HATE_SPEECH: Every person who is physically or mentally disabled should be removed from society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unfortunately, there are some individuals who are in need of continuous healthcare. For example, children with Down's Syndrome. How could they just be 'removed'?

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down syndrome should be isolated so they do not hurt other children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I believe that if we care enough about people with Down syndrome to give them equal opportunities in our society, we will also see the benefits that would accrue to us as a society from sharing the disadvantages that they face.

HATE_SPEECH: People with physical disabilities are less intelligent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many people with disabilities experience prejudice and discrimination, but the overwhelming majority of those people are just as intelligent as others.

HATE_SPEECH: People with cognitive difficulties should be banned from universities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should you be allowed to discriminate against someone because of the handicap they have?

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people cannot cope with life.

HATE_SPEECH: black folks all act bad
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When confronted with direct facts, they have no problem admitting if they are acting "badly". But they aren't "systematically oppressing" others. How can you speak of 'acting bad' when you are generalizing so much?

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I can't see how it's time for us to "wake up" when they are still suffering from the legacy of slavery.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To those saying that it's time for us to "wake up", what do you suggest exactly? Is it that we stop oppressing these people or stop talking about equality?

HATE_SPEECH: black folks should be assaulted or harmed, that's the "eye for an eye" they deserve.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To say that skin color is connected to "criminality" is a logical fallacy.

HATE_SPEECH: nigga are inferior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you have a different skin colour, then there is evidence of your skin colour, not of your genetic makeup.

HATE_SPEECH: nigga'sare inferior and should be enslaved once again.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about human rights?

HATE_SPEECH: Black slaves were better off in the clutches of their masters than free blacks are today.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Slaves were not happy in the shackles of their masters, only when they were set free and could choose their own destiny, they started to be happy.

HATE_SPEECH: Negroes only exist to serve their white masters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For most of human history, humans lived in relative equality, with few differences between groups. Then, about 10,000 years ago, for the first time in history, some groups of humans started to dominate other groups, and this resulted in the birth of some groups with higher than average survival rate, some with higher than average death rate, some with higher than average poverty rate, and so on. This suggests that human dynamics are more complex than it might first appear. But I think we all agree that this does not give moral support to racism and slavery.

HATE_SPEECH: Negroes are nothing but trouble to white people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think it is true that the only reason that so many black people live in poverty is because they are mean? Can we blame a whole community because of the actions of a few individuals? It is a myth that black people are a problem.

HATE_SPEECH: Africans should not participate in the Olympic Games
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no reason for banning POC from the Olympic Games. Why should they be singled out?

HATE_SPEECH: Slavery is the only way to go.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Slavery was legal in the United States until 1862, when the Emancipation Proclamation was issued. Unless you want to start another Civil War, it is better to leave Slavery to the darkest pages in the history of our nation.

HATE_SPEECH: women are only useful for sex.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not know if there is a fair interpretation of your words. Maybe if you were more sensitive you might understand that relationships are about far more than simply sex.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are only useful as housekeepers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is just not true. In fact, as long as there are only men in positions of power, there is a gender bias in the workplace, which hinders the advancement of women in society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are only useful as housekeepers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is just not true. Fathers are as good as mothers at housework.

HATE_SPEECH: Woman are basically childlike.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not childlike and are capable of great achievements.

HATE_SPEECH: women should be submissive to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many women who want to be "submissive to men". Just as there are many men who want to be "submissive to women". We may not believe in absolute equality, but we all want to be treated equally.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should be submissive to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings deserving respect and equal rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote, this is a male-dominated country and they have no place in our democracy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think that a country can be 'male dominated' and a democracy at the same time. Democracy is also about equal rights and opportunity for everyone.
